  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3,013</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The sales growth
in 2008 and 2007 reflects unit growth and the positive effect of the relatively
weaker U.S. dollar.&#160; The relatively
weaker U.S. dollar increased first quarter 2008 consolidated net sales 5.5
percent, increased Total International sales 10.9 percent, increased
Pharmaceutical Products segment sales by 5.9 percent, increased Nutritional
Product segment sales by 3.0 percent, increased Diagnostic Products segment sales
by 8.1 percent and increased Vascular Products segment sales by 4.9 percent
over the first quarter of 2007.&#160;&#160; The
relatively weaker U.S. dollar increased first quarter 2007 consolidated net
sales 2.7 percent, increased Total International sales 5.5 percent, increased
Pharmaceutical Products segment sales by 2.8 percent, increased Nutritional
Product segment sales by 1.0 percent, increased Diagnostic Products segment
sales by 3.9 percent and increased Vascular Products segment sales by 2.7
percent over the first quarter of 2006.&#160;
The sales growth in 2007 for the Nutritional Products segment was
impacted by the completion of the U.S. co-promotion of <i>Synagis </i>in 2006 and sales growth in 2007
for the Vascular Products segment was impacted by the acquisition of Guidant&#146;s
vascular intervention and endovascular solutions businesses in the second
quarter of 2006.&#160; Slower growth of U.S.
sales in 2008 is primarily due to decreased sales of <i>Omnicef </i>due to generic competition.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='13',FILE='C:\JMS\Vmeane\08-11202-1\task2912410\11202-1-bg.htm',USER='vmeane',CD='May  2 11:45 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 44.3pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FINANCIAL REVIEW</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(continued)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A comparison of
significant product group sales for the three months ended March&nbsp;31 is as
follows.&#160; Percent changes are versus the
prior year and are based on unrounded numbers.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">(dollars
in millions)</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&nbsp;</font></i></p>

  <td width="10%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="49%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Diagnostics &#151;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="49%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:49.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Immunochemistry</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">660</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.8</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">560</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.7</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr height="0">
  <td width="312" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="16" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="7" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="56" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="16" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="64" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="16" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="7" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="56" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="16" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="64" style="border:none;"></td>
  <td width="6" style="border:none;"></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 26.3pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Increased sales of <i>HUMIRA</i> and <i>Depakote</i> accounted for the majority of the sales increases
for U.S. Specialty products in both 2008 and 2007.&#160; U.S. sales of <i>HUMIRA</i> were $401 million, $289 million and $218 million for
the three months ended March&nbsp;31, 2008, 2007 and 2006, respectively.&#160; U.S. Primary Care sales in 2008 were impacted
by decreased sales of <i>Omnicef </i>due
to generic competition, partially offset by increased sales of <i>Niaspan</i> and <i>TriCor</i>.&#160; U.S. Primary
Care sales in 2007 were favorably impacted by sales of <i>Niaspan</i>, a new product from the
acquisition of Kos Pharmaceuticals Inc. in the fourth quarter of 2006, and <i>TriCor</i> and were unfavorably impacted by
decreased sales of <i>Biaxin</i>.&#160;&#160; Increased sales of <i>HUMIRA</i> favorably impacted International
Pharmaceutical sales in both 2008 and 2007.&#160;
International sales of <i>HUMIRA</i>
were $476 million, $282 million and $174 million for the three months ended March&nbsp;31,
2008, 2007 and 2006, respectively.&#160;
International Pediatric Nutritionals sales increases in 2008 and 2007
were due primarily to volume growth in developing countries.&#160; The favorable effect of the relatively weaker
U.S. dollar favorably impacted international product sales growth in both
years.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The gross profit
margin was 56.2 percent for the
first quarter 2008, compared to 56.4 percent for the first quarter 2007.&#160; The decrease in the gross profit margin in
2008 was due, in part, to the impact of generic competition for <i>Omnicef</i> and to the unfavorable effect of
exchange on the gross profit margin.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .7pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Research and
development expenses increased 0.1 percent in the first quarter 2008 over the
first quarter 2007.&#160; This increase
reflects timing of spending in the first quarter of 2007 and increased spending
to support pipeline programs, including <i>TriLipix</i>/Crestor
fixed-dose combination for cholesterol, ABT-874, a biologic for psoriasis and
Crohn&#146;s disease, controlled-release <i>Vicodin
CR,</i>  <i>Xience V, </i>as well
as several Phase I and Phase II clinical programs in neuroscience and
oncology.&#160; The majority of research and
development expenditures are concentrated on pharmaceutical products.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .7pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Selling, general
and administrative expenses for the first quarter 2008 increased 12.9 percent
over the first quarter 2007.&#160; This
increase reflects increased selling and marketing support for new and existing
products, including increased spending to support two new indications for <i>HUMIRA, </i>the launch of<i> Simcor </i>and the upcoming U.S. launch of <i>Xience V</i>, as well as spending on other
marketed pharmaceutical products.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='14',FILE='C:\JMS\Vmeane\08-11202-1\task2912410\11202-1-bg.htm',USER='vmeane',CD='May  2 11:45 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FINANCIAL REVIEW</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 1.1pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(continued)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 1.1pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 62.3pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Basis
of Presentation</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 62.3pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott&#146;s core laboratory
diagnostics business, including Point of Care, was presented as discontinued
operations in the Consolidated Statement of Earnings and the Statement of Cash
Flows and as net assets held for sale in the Consolidated Balance Sheet in the Form&nbsp;10-Q
for the three months ended March&nbsp;31, 2007.&#160;
Subsequently, a decision was made to retain the businesses and the 2007
results and net assets are presented as continuing in this Form&nbsp;10-Q. The
results for the three months ended March&nbsp;31, 2007 included depreciation
and amortization through January&nbsp;17, 2007. &#160;The amount of depreciation and amortization
not recorded in the first quarter of 2007 was $38 million, which was recorded
in a subsequent quarter in 2007.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 62.3pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Business
Acquisition</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 62.3pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 9.9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the first
quarter of 2008, Abbott acquired a less than 20 percent interest in a molecular
diagnostic company resulting in a charge to acquired in-process research and
development of $18.7 million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 9.9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Restructurings</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">(dollars
in millions)</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In
2007, 2006 and 2005, Abbott management approved plans to realign its worldwide
pharmaceutical and vascular manufacturing operations and selected domestic and
international commercial and research and development operations in order to
reduce costs.&#160; In addition, Abbott
implemented facilities restructuring plans in 2007 related to the acquired operations
of Kos Pharmaceuticals Inc.&#160; Additional
charges of $22 and $14 were subsequently recorded in the first quarter of 2008
and 2007, respectively, relating to these restructurings, primarily for
accelerated depreciation.&#160; The following
summarizes the activity for restructurings:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="75%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:75.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="70%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:70.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.0%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2008</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>

  at January&nbsp;1</font></p>

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.88%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">194</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.12%;">

  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.88%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">193</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="70%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:70.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Restructuring
  charges</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="70%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:70.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Payments and
  other adjustments</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(48</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0.375pt 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(33</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0.375pt 0in;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="70%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:70.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Accrued balance
  at March&nbsp;31</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.88%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">157</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.12%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.88%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">166</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:1.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Interest (Income)</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Interest income
increased in the first quarter 2008 over 2007 primarily as the result of higher
international investment balances.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(Income) from TAP
Pharmaceutical Products Inc. Joint Venture</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott&#146;s income
from the TAP Pharmaceutical Products Inc. joint venture is lower in 2008
compared to 2007 due primarily to a favorable outcome in a patent dispute
recorded by TAP Pharmaceutical Products Inc. in the first quarter of 2007.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:-.1pt;">As
discussed below, Abbott and Takeda concluded the TAP joint venture on April&nbsp;30,
2008.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='15',FILE='C:\JMS\Vmeane\08-11202-1\task2912410\11202-1-bg.htm',USER='vmeane',CD='May  2 11:45 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FINANCIAL REVIEW</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 1.1pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(continued)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 1.1pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other (Income)
Expense, net</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other (income)
expense, net for the first quarter of 2007 includes a $149 million fair market
value loss adjustment to Abbott&#146;s investment in Boston Scientific common stock,
partially offset by fair value gain adjustments of $24 million to certain
derivative financial instruments related to the investment in Boston Scientific
common stock.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 22.5pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Taxes on Earnings</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 22.5pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Taxes on earnings reflect
the estimated annual effective rates.&#160;
The effective tax rates are less than the statutory U.S. federal income
tax rate principally due to the domestic dividend exclusion and the benefit of
lower statutory tax rates and tax exemptions in several taxing jurisdictions.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subsequent Event and Pro
Forma Information</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On April&nbsp;30, 2008,
Abbott and Takeda ended their TAP Pharmaceutical Products Inc. (TAP) joint
venture, evenly splitting the value and assets of the joint venture.&#160; Abbott exchanged its equity interest in TAP
for the assets, liabilities and employees related to TAP&#146;s <i>Lupron</i> business.&#160; The Internal Revenue Service has issued a
private letter ruling that the transaction qualifies as tax-free for U.S.
income tax purposes.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Beginning on May&nbsp;1,
2008, Abbott began recording <i>Lupron</i> net
sales and costs in its operating results and no longer records income from the
TAP joint venture.&#160; TAP&#146;s sales of <i>Lupron</i> were $147 million for the three
months ended March&nbsp;31, 2008 and $645 million for the full year 2007.&#160; Abbott will also receive payments based on
specified development, approval and commercial events being achieved with
respect to products retained by TAP and payments from TAP based on sales of
products retained by TAP, which will be recorded by Abbott as Other (income)
expense as earned.&#160; Such payments, which
will be subject to tax, are expected to approximate $1.5 billion over a
five-year period.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The exchange transaction
will be accounted for as a sale of Abbott&#146;s equity interest in TAP and as an
acquisition of TAP&#146;s <i>Lupron</i>
business under SFAS No.&nbsp;141 &#147;Business Combinations.&#148;&#160; The sale of Abbott&#146;s equity interest in TAP
will result in the recording of net assets of approximately $250 million
related to the <i>Lupron</i> business,
primarily cash, receivables, inventory and other assets, net of accounts
payable and other accrued liabilities, offset by a credit to Abbott&#146;s
investment in TAP in the amount of approximately $250 million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For the acquired <i>Lupron</i> business, Abbott will record
intangible assets, primarily <i>Lupron</i>
product rights, of approximately $700 million, goodwill of approximately $350
million and deferred tax liabilities related to the intangible assets of
approximately $250 million.&#160; The
intangible assets will be amortized over fifteen years.&#160; Abbott has also agreed to remit cash to TAP
if certain research and development events are not achieved on the development
assets retained by TAP.&#160; These amounts
will be recorded as a liability at closing in the amount of approximately $1.1
billion.&#160; Related deferred tax assets of
approximately $400 million will also be recorded, resulting in an after-tax
liability of up to $700 million.&#160; If
these payments are not required, the liability would be reduced and a gain
would be recorded.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The exchange of Abbott&#146;s
investment in TAP for TAP&#146;s <i>Lupron</i>
business resulted in a gain at closing that is expected to be approximately
$100 million, which is in addition to the amounts discussed in the second
paragraph above.&#160; Abbott expects the
earnings impact of the transaction, including the amortization of the <i>Lupron</i> intangible product rights, but
excluding the gain, to be neutral to net earnings and earnings per share in
2008 and neutral or better over the next five years.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='16',FILE='C:\JMS\Vmeane\08-11202-1\task2912410\11202-1-bg.htm',USER='vmeane',CD='May  2 11:45 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">FINANCIAL REVIEW</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 1.1pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(continued)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 1.1pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 22.5pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Liquidity and
Capital Resources at March&nbsp;31, 2008 Compared with December&nbsp;31, 2007</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 22.5pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Net cash from
operating activities for the first three months 2008 totaled approximately $1.3
billion.&#160; Other, net in Net cash from
operating activities for 2008 and 2007 includes the effects of contributions to
the main domestic defined benefit plan of $200 million each period and to the
post-employment medical and dental plans of $65 million and $75 million,
respectively. Abbott expects annual cash flow from operating activities to
continue to exceed Abbott&#146;s capital expenditures and cash dividends.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Working capital
was $4.3 billion at March&nbsp;31, 2008 and $4.9 billion at December&nbsp;31,
2007.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the first
quarter of 2008, Abbott paid off $200 million of long-term notes that were due
in March&nbsp;of 2008 using short-term borrowings.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .9pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At March&nbsp;31, 2008,
Abbott&#146;s long-term debt rating was AA by Standard&nbsp;&amp; Poor&#146;s Corporation
and A1 by Moody&#146;s Investors Service.&#160;
Abbott has readily available financial resources, including unused lines
of credit of $3.0 billion<font style="letter-spacing:-.1pt;">  </font>that support commercial paper borrowing arrangements.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In 2006, the board of
directors authorized the purchase of $2.5 billion of Abbott&#146;s common shares
from time to time.&#160; During the first
three months of 2008 and 2007, Abbott purchased approximately 14.1 million and
15.4 million, respectively, of its common shares at a cost of approximately
$800 million and $827 million, respectively.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .2pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Under a
registration statement filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission in February&nbsp;2006,
Abbott may offer and sell from time to time debt securities in one or more
offerings through February&nbsp;2009.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .2pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Legislative Issues</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott&#146;s primary
markets are highly competitive and subject to substantial government regulation
throughout the world.&#160; Abbott expects
debate to continue over the availability, method of delivery, and payment for
health care products and services.&#160;
Abbott believes that if legislation is enacted, it could have the effect
of reducing access to health care products and services, or reducing prices or
the rate of price increases for health care products and services.&#160; It is not possible to predict the extent to
which Abbott or the health care industry in general might be adversely affected
by these factors in the future.&#160; A more
complete discussion of&nbsp;these factors is contained in Item 1, Business, and
Item 1A, Risk Factors on Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31,
2007.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Private Securities
Litigation Reform Act of 1995 &#151; A Caution Concerning Forward-Looking Statements</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 5.4pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Under
the safe harbor provisions of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of
1995, Abbott cautions investors that any forward-looking statements or
projections made by Abbott, including those made in this document, are subject
to risks and uncertainties that may cause actual results to differ materially
from those projected. Economic, competitive, governmental, technological and
other factors that may affect Abbott&#146;s operations are discussed in Item 1A,
Risk Factors to the Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31,
2007.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 5.4pt .0001pt 0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">PART&nbsp;I.&#160; FINANCIAL INFORMATION</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Item
4.</font></u><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160; </font></b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Controls
and Procedures</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .45in;text-indent:-.2in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Evaluation of disclosure controls and procedures.&#160; </font></i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
Chief Executive Officer, Miles D. White, and Chief Financial Officer, Thomas C.
Freyman, evaluated the effectiveness of Abbott Laboratories&#146; disclosure
controls and procedures as of the end of the period covered by this report, and
concluded that Abbott Laboratories&#146; disclosure controls and procedures were
effective to ensure that information Abbott is required to disclose in the reports
that it files or submits with the Securities and Exchange Commission under the
Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the &#147;Exchange Act&#148;) is recorded, processed,
summarized and reported, within the time periods specified in the Commission&#146;s rules&nbsp;and
forms, and to ensure that information required to be disclosed by Abbott in the
reports that it files or submits under the Exchange Act is accumulated and
communicated to Abbott&#146;s management, including its principal executive officer
and principal financial officer, as appropriate to allow timely decisions
regarding required disclosure.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .45in;text-indent:-.2in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Changes in internal control over financial reporting.</font></i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; During the quarter ended March&nbsp;31, 2008,
there were no changes in Abbott&#146;s internal control over financial reporting (as
defined in Rule&nbsp;13a-15(f)&nbsp;under the Exchange Act) that have
materially affected, or are reasonably likely to materially affect, Abbott&#146;s
internal control over financial reporting.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='18',FILE='C:\JMS\Vmeane\08-11202-1\task2912186\11202-1-bi.htm',USER='vmeane',CD='May  2 09:41 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">PART&nbsp;II.&#160;&#160;&#160; OTHER INFORMATION</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 47.9pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-47.9pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Item 1.</font></u><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Legal Proceedings</u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 47.9pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-47.9pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott is involved in various claims, legal
proceedings and investigations, including (as of March&nbsp;31, 2008, except as
otherwise indicated) those described below.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As reported in our 2007 Form&nbsp;10-K, a case is
pending against Abbott in the United States District Court for the Eastern
District of Texas, in which New York University (NYU) and Centocor,&nbsp;Inc.
assert that Humira&#174; infringes a patent co-owned by NYU and Centocor and
exclusively licensed to Centocor.&#160; On March&nbsp;5,
2008 an arbitrator ruled that Abbott has a license to the patents at issue for
a portion of Humira&#174; sales.&#160; Non-licensed
sales remain at issue in the litigation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As reported in our 2007 Form&nbsp;10-K, in
the case <i>In re:</i>  <i>Pharmaceutical Industry Average Wholesale Price
Litigation, MDL 1456</i>, a number of cases are pending that allege
generally that Abbott and numerous other pharmaceutical companies reported
false pricing in connection with certain drugs that are reimbursable under
Medicare and Medicaid and by private payors.&#160;
In March&nbsp;2008, eleven pharmaceutical companies, including Abbott,
agreed to settle a purported class action in which plaintiffs were seeking to
certify nationwide classes of Medicare Part&nbsp;B consumers, third party
payors and other consumers.&#160; The
settlement is subject to court approval.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of April&nbsp;18, 2008, twenty five states
and the District of Columbia had filed a lawsuit, <i>State of Florida, et al.</i> against Abbott, Fournier Industrie
et Sante and Laboratoires Fournier, S.A., in the United States District Court
for the District of Delaware alleging antitrust and consumer fraud claims in
connection with the sale of fenofibrate formulations.&#160; Together with the District of Columbia, the
states seek treble damages, injunctive relief and other relief on behalf of
residents and state agencies.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott is seeking to enforce its patent rights
relating to fenofibrate tablets (a drug Abbott sells under the trademark
Tricor&#174;).&#160; In a case filed in the United
States District Court for the Northern District of Illinois in February&nbsp;2008,
Abbott with the patent owner, Laboratoires Fournier, S.A., seeks injunctive
relief against Teva Pharmaceuticals USA Inc.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott is seeking to enforce its patent
rights relating to extended release divalproex sodium (a drug Abbott sells
under the trademark Depakote&#174; ER).&#160; In a
case filed in the United States District Court for the Eastern District of
Michigan in February&nbsp;2008, Abbott seeks injunctive relief against Sun
Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">While it is not feasible to predict with
certainty the outcome of the pending claims, proceedings and investigations in
which Abbott is involved, management is of the opinion that their ultimate
dispositions should not have a material adverse effect on Abbott&#146;s financial
position, cash flows, or results of operations, except (i)&nbsp;as noted in our
2007 Form&nbsp;10-K, and (ii)&nbsp;with respect to the fourth paragraph above,
the ultimate disposition could be material to Abbott&#146;s financial position, cash
flows or results of operations for a quarter.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<h5 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:none;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Item 2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Unregistered
Sales of Equity Securities and Use of Proceeds</font></h5>

<h5 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h5>

tax withholding obligations in connection with the vesting of restricted stock
or restricted stock units.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 71.3pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-23.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On October&nbsp;18,
2006, Abbott announced that its board of directors approved the purchase of up
to $2.5 billion of its common shares.</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Item 5.</font></u><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Other Information</u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On April&nbsp;30, 2008, Abbott Laboratories
and Takeda Pharmaceutical Company Limited completed their transaction to
conclude their joint venture that had been operated through TAP Pharmaceutical
Products Inc., a close corporation.&#160; The
information appearing in this Item is intended to satisfy Abbott&#146;s disclosure
obligations under Items 2.01 and 9.01 of Form&nbsp;8-K.&#160; The disclosure appearing in Part&nbsp;1 under
the heading &#147;Financial Review &#150; Subsequent Event and Pro Forma Information&#148; is
incorporated by reference into this Item.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Item 6.</font></u><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Exhibits</u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Incorporated by reference to the Exhibit&nbsp;Index
included herewith.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SIGNATURE</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934,
the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the
undersigned thereunto duly authorized.</font></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="48%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.74%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="48%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.88%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.38%;">

  </td>
  <td width="48%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.74%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.26%;">

  </td>
  <td width="43%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:43.62%;">

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><b><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 2</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Contribution and
Exchange Agreement by and among Abbott Laboratories, Takeda Pharmaceutical
Company Limited,<br>
Takeda America Holdings, Inc., TAP Pharmaceutical Products Inc., Lake Products
Inc.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">and Takeda
Pharmaceuticals LLC dated as of March 19, 2008*</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>In accordance with Item 601(b)(2) of
Regulation S-K, the schedules and similar attachments to this agreement, which
are listed in the table of contents of this agreement, have not been filed,
with the exception of Exhibit&nbsp;I to this agreement. The registrant agrees
to furnish a copy of any omitted schedule or similar attachment to the SEC upon
request.</p>

 <tr>

  </td>
  <td width="74%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:74.44%;">

  </td>

  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:4.44%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">vi</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
