<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='vi',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2910455\11202-1-kc-01.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='May  1 14:58 2008' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CONTRIBUTION AND EXCHANGE AGREEMENT</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Contribution and Exchange Agreement (this &#147;<u>Agreement</u>&#148;),
dated as of March&nbsp;19, 2008 and amended and restated as of April&nbsp;30,
2008, by and among Abbott Laboratories, an Illinois corporation (&#147;<u>Abbott</u>&#148;),
Takeda Pharmaceutical Company Limited, a Japanese corporation (&#147;<u>Takeda</u>&#148;),
Takeda America Holdings,&nbsp;Inc., a New York corporation and wholly-owned
subsidiary of Takeda (&#147;<u>TAH</u>&#148;), TAP Pharmaceutical Products Inc., a close
corporation incorporated in Delaware (&#147;<u>TAP</u>&#148;), Lake Products Inc., a
Delaware corporation (&#147;<u>Newco</u>&#148;), and Takeda Pharmaceuticals LLC, a
Delaware limited liability company (&#147;<u>VEP LLC</u>&#148;), amends and restates in
its entirety<b>  </b>the Contribution and
Exchange Agreement, dated as of March&nbsp;19, 2008, by and among Abbott, Takeda,
TAH, TAP and Newco (the &#147;<u>Original Agreement</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">W I T N E S S E T H</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, TAP is a close corporation jointly owned by TAH and Abbott and
is engaged in the Split-off Business and the Retained Business;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, upon the terms and subject to the conditions of this
Agreement, (i)&nbsp;TAP desires to contribute to Newco certain Assets used or
held for use primarily in the conduct of the Split-off Business, certain other
Assets, and an amount of cash, if any, equal to half of the Net Assets of TAP
(prior to the Contemplated Transactions) less the Net Assets of the Split-off
Business (giving effect to the Contemplated Transactions), subject to
subsequent adjustment, and (ii)&nbsp;Newco desires to assume, among other
things, the Liabilities associated primarily with, or to the extent arising out
of the conduct of, the Split-off Business and such other Assets and certain
other Liabilities;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, upon the terms and subject to the
conditions of this Agreement, TAP desires to exchange with Abbott, and Abbott
desires to exchange with TAP, immediately following the consummation of the
Contribution and Assumption, all of the issued and outstanding Newco Stock for
all of the issued and outstanding TAP Class&nbsp;A Common Stock owned by
Abbott;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, in accordance with the Original
Agreement, VEP LLC has been established to facilitate certain arrangements
between TAP and Newco with respect to VEP Products after the Closing, and the
Parties wish to amend and restate the Original Agreement in its entirety and to
provide for the amendment and restatement of certain other Transaction
Documents to reflect changes to the documentation of the Contemplated
Transactions as contemplated by the Original Agreement; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Parties are entering into the
Contemplated Transactions pursuant to a plan of reorganization in accordance
with Sections&nbsp;368(a)(1)(D)&nbsp;and 355 of the Code, and the Parties
intend for such Contemplated Transactions to qualify as a tax free
reorganization under such sections of the Code.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2910455\11202-1-kc-03.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='May  1 15:00 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the foregoing and the respective
representations, warranties, covenants and agreements set forth hereinafter and
in the other Transaction Documents, the Parties agree as follows:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE 1</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">DEFINITIONS</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.01</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Definitions</u>.&#160; Capitalized terms used but not otherwise
defined herein shall have the respective meanings specified in <u>Exhibit&nbsp;I</u>
to this Agreement.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE 2</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">TRANSFER AND ASSUMPTION OF ASSETS AND
LIABILITIES</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.01</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Contribution of the
Transferred Assets and Assumption of the Assumed Liabilities</u>.&#160; Upon the terms and subject to the conditions
of this Agreement, including <b>Article&nbsp;12</b>,
immediately prior to the Exchange, (i)&nbsp;TAP shall assign, transfer, convey
and deliver as a capital contribution to Newco, and Newco shall accept, all of
the right, title and interest of TAP in, to and under the Transferred Assets,
free and clear of all Liens running for the benefit of TAP or any of the TAP
Subsidiaries, (ii)&nbsp;if the Estimated Net Asset Equalization Amount is
greater than zero, TAP shall contribute to Newco cash in the amount of the
Estimated Net Asset Equalization Amount and (iii)&nbsp;Newco shall assume and
agree to pay, perform and discharge when due all of the Assumed Liabilities
(clauses (i), (ii)&nbsp;and (iii), collectively, the &#147;<u>Contribution and
Assumption</u>&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.02</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Retained Assets and
Liabilities</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, TAP
shall not assign, transfer, convey or deliver to Newco, nor shall Newco accept,
any right, title or interest in, to or under any Retained Assets.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Newco shall not assume or have any responsibility for
any Retained Liabilities.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.03</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Contribution
Deliveries</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Immediately prior to the Exchange on the Closing Date
(the &#147;<u>Contribution Effective Time</u>&#148;), TAP shall duly execute and/or
deliver to Newco:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">a wire transfer of immediately
available funds in an amount equal to the Estimated Net Asset Equalization
Amount, if the Estimated Net Asset Equalization Amount is greater than zero;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">(A)&nbsp;a special warranty deed
conveying the Headquarters Facility to Newco in the form attached hereto as <u>Attachment
A</u> (the &#147;<u>Special Warranty Deed</u>&#148;), (B)&nbsp;a title policy from First
American Title Insurance Company (or another title company mutually acceptable
to Abbott and TAH) (the </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2910455\11202-1-kc-03.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='May  1 15:00 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Title Company</u>&#148;)
for an ALTA extended coverage title policy insuring Newco in an amount equal to
at least the Title Commitment Headquarters Value in form and substance
reasonably acceptable to Abbott and containing the following endorsements: (1)&nbsp;an
endorsement deleting the standard printed exceptions; (2)&nbsp;an endorsement
insuring that the insured property is the same as depicted in the Survey; (3)&nbsp;an
endorsement insuring access to the Premises by vehicles from North Field Drive,
Lake Forest, Illinois; (4)&nbsp;an endorsement insuring against loss of title
to the Headquarters Facility or the inability of the owner of the Premises to
maintain or operate the improvements now located on the Premises by reason of a
violation of a covenant, condition or restriction of record at Closing
affecting the Headquarters Facility; (5)&nbsp;a 3.1 zoning endorsement insuring
that the Headquarters Facility, as currently operated, is in compliance with
all applicable zoning ordinances and regulations; (6)&nbsp;a tax parcel
endorsement; (7)&nbsp;a contiguity endorsement and (8)&nbsp;such other
endorsements as Abbott may reasonably request which the Title Company commits
to issue<b>  </b>(the &#147;<u>Title Policy</u>&#148;),
(C)&nbsp;a current survey of the Headquarters Facility prepared in accordance
with &#147;Minimum Standard Detail Requirements for ALTA/ACSM Land Title Surveys,&#148;
jointly established and adopted by ALTA and ACSM in 2005 in form and content
reasonably acceptable to Abbott and including ALTA Table A items 2, 3, 4, 6, 7(a),
7(c), 8, 9, 10, 11(c), 16 and 18 (the &#147;<u>Survey</u>&#148;)<b>  </b>and (D)&nbsp;all affidavits, statements,
transfer tax declarations and other items necessary to effectuate the transfer
of the Headquarters Facility to Newco and cause the Title Company to issue the
Title Policy; <u>provided</u> that any and all costs and expenses of the
deliveries identified in clauses (B)&nbsp;and (C)&nbsp;shall be borne entirely
by TAP (which costs and expenses shall be reflected as a Liability on the TAP
Closing Balance Sheet or paid by TAP prior to the Closing);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in .5in .0001pt;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Contribution, Conveyance and
Assumption Agreement;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">instruments for the transfer to
Newco of the Identifiable Intellectual Property set forth in <u>Schedule
4.15(a)(i)</u> of the TAP Disclosure Schedules, in the forms attached hereto as
<u>Attachment B</u>;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Transferred Assets specified in
clause&nbsp;(m)&nbsp;of the definition of Transferred Assets; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">a non-foreign person affidavit as
required by Section&nbsp;1445 of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">At the Contribution Effective Time, Newco shall duly
execute and deliver to TAP:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Contribution, Conveyance and
Assumption Agreement; and</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2910455\11202-1-kc-03.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='May  1 15:00 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">instruments for the transfer to
Newco of the Identifiable Intellectual Property set forth in <u>Schedule
4.15(a)(i)</u>&nbsp;of the TAP Disclosure Schedules, in the forms attached
hereto as <u>Attachment B</u>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Notwithstanding anything in <b>Section&nbsp;2.01</b> or this <b>Section&nbsp;2.03</b>
to the contrary, TAP may assign, transfer, deliver, convey and contribute to
Newco any Transferred Asset and cause Newco to assume any Assumed Liability, in
each case, prior to the Contribution Effective Time and upon mutual written
agreement of the Parties.&#160; Any such
mutual written agreement shall specify that the subject action may be unwound
in the event this Agreement is terminated pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;13.01</b>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.04</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Third Party Consents;
Assignment of Contracts and Rights</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Subject to the terms of this Agreement, prior to the
Contribution Effective Time, TAP shall, and </font><font color="black"><font style="color:windowtext;">Abbott and TAH shall each instruct TAP to (and, if applicable, vote to
cause TAP to)</font>, use commercially reasonable efforts to take such actions,
make such filings, furnish such information and seek timely to obtain any Third
Party Consents reasonably determined by either TAH or Abbott as being required
in connection with the consummation of the Contemplated Transactions.&#160; Fifty percent (50%) of all out-of-pocket
costs, including any consent fees, incurred by TAP in connection with taking
such actions, making such filings, furnishing such information and seeking or
obtaining such Third Party Consents (to the extent such costs are not reflected
on the TAP Closing Balance Sheet or paid by TAP prior to the Closing) shall be
promptly reimbursed by Newco upon the written request of TAP.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">In the event any Third Party Consent, which is
determined by Abbott to be required in connection with the consummation of the
Contemplated Transactions, is not obtained prior to the Contribution Effective
Time, TAP shall, and TAH shall cause TAP to, subsequent to the Contribution
Effective Time, continue to use its commercially reasonable efforts to promptly
obtain such Third Party Consent.&#160; In the
event that TAP makes any payment to any Person to induce such Person to grant any
Third Party Consent, which Third Party Consent is determined by Abbott or TAH
to be required in connection with the consummation of the Contemplated
Transactions and is not obtained prior to the Contribution Effective Time,
fifty percent (50%) of the amount of such payment and related out-of-pocket
costs and expenses (including reasonable attorneys&#146; fees) of TAP shall be
promptly reimbursed by Newco upon written request by TAP (to the extent not
reflected on the TAP Closing Balance Sheet or paid by TAP prior to the
Closing); <u>provided</u> that any such payment shall be approved in advance in
writing by Abbott.&#160; Abbott shall
cooperate with TAP in connection with obtaining such Third Party Consents and
shall use commercially reasonable efforts (but not payment of money) to obtain
such Third Party Consents.&#160; After the
Contribution Effective Time, until any such Third Party Consent is received, (i)&nbsp;TAP
and Newco shall cooperate with each other in any reasonable and lawful
arrangements designed to provide to Newco the benefits, obligations and
Liabilities associated with such Transferred Asset, (ii)&nbsp;Newco shall
timely discharge and perform when due all of the obligations of TAP associated
with such Transferred Asset, including all payment obligations, as if Newco
were the Party in interest thereto, and (iii)&nbsp;TAP shall enforce, at the
reasonable request of Newco, any rights of TAP relating to such Transferred
Asset; <u>provided</u> that, upon written request of TAP, Newco shall promptly
reimburse TAP for (x)&nbsp;fifty percent (50%) of all out-of-pocket costs and
expenses (including reasonable attorneys&#146; fees) of TAP incurred </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">pursuant
to clause (i)&nbsp;of this sentence after the Closing but prior to the one year
anniversary of the Closing Date and (y)&nbsp;all out-of-pocket costs and
expenses (including reasonable attorneys&#146; fees) of TAP incurred pursuant to
clause&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;of this sentence after the Closing or pursuant to
clause&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;of this sentence on or after the one year anniversary of
the Closing Date, to the extent, in the case of each of the foregoing
clauses&nbsp;(x)&nbsp;and (y), not reflected on the TAP Closing Balance
Sheet.&#160; Once such Third Party Consent for
the transfer of any applicable Transferred Asset not transferred at the
Contribution Effective Time is obtained, TAP shall promptly transfer, or cause
to be transferred, such Transferred Asset to Newco for no additional
consideration.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Unless the Parties agree otherwise, any Mixed Contract
that exists as of the Contribution Effective Time shall be assigned in part to
Newco, if so assignable, upon or after the Contribution Effective Time, so that
each of Newco and TAP shall be entitled to the rights and benefits and shall
assume the related portion of any Liabilities inuring to their respective
businesses; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that in no event shall TAP be
required to assign any Mixed Contract in its entirety.&#160; If any Mixed Contract cannot be so partially
assigned, TAP and Newco shall take such other reasonable and permissible
actions to cause (i)&nbsp;the Assets associated with that portion of each Mixed
Contract that relates to the Retained Business to be enjoyed by TAP; (ii)&nbsp;the
Liabilities associated with that portion of each Mixed Contract that relates to
the Retained Business to be borne by TAP; (iii)&nbsp;the Assets associated with
that portion of each Mixed Contract that relates to the Split-off Business to
be enjoyed by Newco; and (iv)&nbsp;the Liabilities associated with that portion
of each Mixed Contract that relates to the Split-off Business to be borne by
Newco.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">At the Closing, the Interchangeable Assets shall be
physically apportioned between the Retained Business and the Split-off Business
on an approximately pro rata basis in accordance with the overall usage of the
Interchangeable Assets by the Retained Business and the Split-off Business as
of immediately prior to the Closing Date.&#160;
The portion of the Interchangeable Assets so apportioned to the Retained
Business shall constitute Retained Assets and the portion of the
Interchangeable Assets so apportioned to the Split-off Business shall
constitute Transferred Assets.&#160; After the
Closing, except as otherwise provided in this Agreement or any other
Transaction Document, (i)&nbsp;Newco and its Affiliates shall have no right of
access to, possession of or use of the Interchangeable Assets that constitute
Retained Assets and (ii)&nbsp;TAP and its Affiliates shall have no right of
access to, possession of or use of the Interchangeable Assets that constitute
Transferred Assets.&#160; Prior to the
Closing, TAH and Abbott shall cooperate in good faith to identify and determine
the allocation of each such Interchangeable Asset in accordance herewith.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Subject to the terms of any arrangement between TAP
and Newco pursuant to clause (i)&nbsp;in <b>Section&nbsp;2.04(b)</b>,
subsequent to the Contribution Effective Time, TAP shall promptly pay to Newco
when received any amounts received by TAP pertaining primarily to any
Transferred Asset or any claim, right or benefit arising under any Transferred
Asset.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Subsequent to the Contribution Effective Time, Newco
shall promptly pay to TAP when received any amounts received by Newco
pertaining primarily to any Retained Asset or any claim, right or benefit
arising under any Retained Asset (including any Split-off Accounts Receivable
retained by TAP as a Retained Asset pursuant to the terms of this Agreement).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.05</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Governmental
Authorizations</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Subject to the terms of this Agreement, prior to the
Contribution Effective Time, TAP shall, and </font><font color="black"><font style="color:windowtext;">Abbott and TAH shall each instruct TAP to (and, if applicable, vote to
cause TAP to)</font>, and Abbott and TAH (at the cost and expense of TAP)
shall, as the case may be, use commercially reasonable efforts to take such
actions, make such filings, furnish such information and seek timely to obtain
such Governmental Authorizations, if any, as are required in connection with
the consummation of the Contemplated Transactions.&#160; In addition, pursuant to 21 C.F.R. &#167;
314.72(a)(1), TAP shall, at the time of transfer, notify the FDA in writing of
all NDAs and INDs transferred from TAP to Newco and that all rights to such
NDAs and INDs have been transferred to Newco.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notwithstanding
anything to the contrary herein, Newco acknowledges and agrees that if there
are any Governmental Authorizations pertaining primarily to the Split-off
Business (or are otherwise necessary to engage in the Split-off Business from
and after the Contribution Effective Time) that are non-transferable or
otherwise not transferred to Newco prior to or at the Contribution Effective
Time pursuant to this Agreement (the &#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Non-Transferred Permits</u></font>&#148;),
the same shall be retained by TAP from and after the Contribution Effective
Time for the benefit of Newco.<b>&#160; </b>For a period of one year after the
Closing Date, TAP shall, and TAH shall cause TAP to, continue to use its
commercially reasonable efforts to promptly transfer any transferable
Non-Transferred Permits pertaining primarily to the Split-off Business.&#160; In the event TAP makes any payment to any
third party to transfer any such transferable Non-Transferred Permit, fifty
percent (50%) of the amount of such payment and related out-of-pocket costs and
expenses of TAP (including reasonable attorneys&#146; fees) shall be promptly
reimbursed by Newco upon written request by TAP (to the extent not reflected on
the TAP Closing Balance Sheet or paid by TAP prior to the Closing); <u>provided</u>
that (except for any such payment to a Governmental Authority that is required
by Law to transfer any Non-Transferred Permit) Newco shall be obligated to make
the respective payment to TAP only if Abbott has approved such third party
payment in writing in advance.&#160; TAP and
Newco shall cooperate with each other in any reasonable and lawful arrangements
to provide to Newco the benefits, obligations and Liabilities associated with
each Non-Transferred Permit until such time as Newco obtains a replacement
Governmental Authorization, but the obligations of TAP under this <b>Section&nbsp;2.05(b)&nbsp;</b>to maintain any
Non-Transferred Permit and provide any benefits thereunder to Newco shall
expire on the one year<b>  </b>anniversary
of the Closing Date (the &#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Permit
Expiration Date</u></font>&#148;) and TAP shall have no
obligation to renew or take action to otherwise extend any such Non-Transferred
Permit that expires prior thereto on its own terms.&#160; After the Closing, Newco shall timely
discharge and perform when due all of the obligations of TAP associated with
such Non-Transferred Permit, including all payment obligations, as if Newco
were the party in interest thereto.&#160; TAP
may terminate any and all Non-Transferred Permits in its discretion upon or at
any time after the Permit Expiration Date.&#160;
From and after the Closing, in the event TAP identifies a Governmental
Authorization transferred to Newco as a Transferred Asset that is related to
the Retained Business, then upon written request by TAP, (i)&nbsp;Newco shall
cooperate with TAP in any reasonable and lawful arrangement designed to provide
TAP with the benefits associated with such Governmental Authorization, and (ii)&nbsp;TAP
shall promptly reimburse Newco for fifty percent (50%) of its out-of-pocket
costs and expenses (including reasonable attorneys&#146; fees) attributable to
providing TAP with the benefits associated with such Governmental </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Authorization.&#160; The obligations of Newco under this <b>Section&nbsp;2.05(b)&nbsp;</b>to make any
Governmental Authorization available to TAP shall expire on the Permit
Expiration Date.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:71.5pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;2.06</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Authorization of
Transactions</u>.&#160; In accordance with Section&nbsp;350
of the General Corporation Law of the State of Delaware, TAH and Abbott hereby
agree that TAH and Abbott, as the stockholders of TAP, shall control the
authorization and approval, on behalf of TAP, of this Agreement and the
Contemplated Transactions, and each of TAH and Abbott hereby grants all
consents and approvals necessary for the consummation of the Contemplated
Transactions under the organizational documents of TAP, the Laws of the State
of Delaware and any applicable Contracts between such Parties and TAP.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE 3</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">EXCHANGE</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3.01</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Exchange</u>.&#160; Upon the terms and subject to the conditions
of this Agreement, the Parties agree that, following the consummation of the
Contribution and Assumption, at the Closing, TAP shall transfer and deliver to
Abbott all of the issued and outstanding Newco Stock, free and clear of any and
all Liens, and in exchange for such Newco Stock, Abbott shall concurrently
transfer and deliver to TAP all of the issued and outstanding TAP Class&nbsp;A
Common Stock (the &#147;<u>Exchange</u>&#148;), free and clear of any and all Liens.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3.02</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Closing</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Upon the terms and subject to the conditions of this
Agreement, the closing of the transactions contemplated hereby (the &#147;<u>Closing</u>&#148;)
will be held at the offices of Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher&nbsp;&amp; Flom
LLP, 333 West Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois, on the later of (i)&nbsp;April&nbsp;30,
2008 (the &#147;<u>Target Closing Date</u>&#148;) if the conditions to the Closing set
forth in <b>Article&nbsp;11</b> have then
been satisfied or waived (other than such conditions which by their nature are
to be satisfied at the Closing) and (ii)&nbsp;the last Business Day of the
month in which<b>  </b>satisfaction or
waiver of the conditions set forth in <b>Article&nbsp;11</b>
occurs (other than such conditions which by their nature are to be satisfied at
the Closing), in each case other than as TAH and Abbott may mutually agree in
writing.&#160; Notwithstanding anything herein
to the contrary, if satisfaction or waiver of the conditions set forth in <b>Article&nbsp;11</b> (other than such conditions
which by their nature are to be satisfied at the Closing) occurs prior to the
Target Closing Date, the Closing shall be held on any Business Day prior to the
Target Closing Date that Takeda designates upon written notice to Abbott at
least five (5)&nbsp;Business Days prior to such designated date; <u>provided</u>
that such designated date must be the last Business Day of a month.&#160; The date on which the Closing actually occurs
shall be referred to as the &#147;<u>Closing Date</u>,&#148; and, except as otherwise
expressly provided herein, the Closing shall for all purposes be deemed
effective as of 11:59 PM, Central Time, on the Closing Date.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">At the Closing, TAH or TAP, as appropriate, shall duly
execute (and, if applicable, TAP shall
cause the TAP Sales Subsidiary to execute) and/or deliver or cause to be
delivered to Abbott or Newco, as the case may be:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">certificates evidencing the shares
of Newco Stock to be delivered by TAP under this Agreement, free and clear of
all Liens, preemptive </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2910455\11202-1-kc-03.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='May  1 15:00 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">or similar rights or
any other limitation or restriction, duly endorsed in blank or accompanied by
stock powers duly endorsed in blank;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 35.1pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Transition Services Agreement;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 35.1pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Tolling Agreement-Prevacid;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 35.1pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Tolling Agreement-Uloric;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Tolling Agreement-Lupron;</font></p>

regarding TAH); and</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">At the Closing, Abbott or Newco, as appropriate, shall
duly execute (and/or cause Abbott-Canada and/or Abbott-Puerto Rico and/or
Abbott Laboratories Inc. to execute, if applicable) and/or deliver or cause to
be delivered to TAH or TAP, as the case may be:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">certificates evidencing the shares
of TAP Class&nbsp;A Common Stock to be</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 35.1pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">delivered by Abbott under this Agreement,
free and clear of all Liens, preemptive or similar rights or any other
limitation or restriction, other than as set forth in TAP&#146;s certificate of
incorporation, duly endorsed in blank or accompanied by stock powers duly
endorsed in blank;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Transition Services Agreement;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(xviii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Lease Assignment and Assumption Agreement
(Bedminster);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(xix)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Lease Assignment and Assumption Agreement
(Bannockburn);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(xx)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">a counterpart signature page&nbsp;to the VEP LLC
Operating Agreement documenting Newco&#146;s becoming the Class&nbsp;B Member;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(xxi)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">resignations from each director and officer of TAP
listed on <u>Schedule 3.02(c)</u>;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(xxii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">a certificate of an executive officer of Abbott as to
the matters set forth in <b>Sections 11.02(b)&nbsp;</b>(as
to matters regarding Abbott) and <b>11.02(c)</b>;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(xxiii)&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Schedule 5.06</u>; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.7in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(xxiv)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all other previously undelivered
certificates and other documents required to be delivered by Abbott or Newco,
as the case may be, to TAH or TAP, as the case may be, in connection with the
Contemplated Transactions.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">At the Closing, TAP shall duly execute (and/or cause
the TAP Sales Subsidiary and/or Newco Lupron Sales Subsidiary to execute, if
applicable) and/or deliver or cause to be delivered, as the case may be:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to Abbott, a certificate of the
president and executive vice president of TAP as to the matters set forth in <b>Sections 11.03(d)&nbsp;</b>and <b>11.03(e)&nbsp;</b>(as to matters regarding
TAP);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">(A)&nbsp;to each of the parties
thereto and to Abbott, the Contribution and Distribution Agreement and (B)&nbsp;to
the other party thereto and to Abbott, a contribution, conveyance and
assumption agreement between the TAP Sales Subsidiary and Newco Lupron Sales
Subsidiary, substantially similar to the Contribution, Conveyance and
Assumption Agreement, evidencing the transfer of Transferred Assets and
assumption of Assumed Liabilities contemplated by <b>Section&nbsp;7.02(a)(ii)(B)</b>;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to TAH, a certificate of the
president and executive vice president of TAP as to the matters set forth in <b>Sections 11.02(b)&nbsp;</b>(as to matters
regarding TAP) and <b>11.02(d)</b>;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to Abbott, Newco and Newco Sales
Subsidiary, resignations from each director and officer of Newco and Newco
Sales Subsidiary;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to the other party thereto, the VEP
LLC Operating Agreement and, to Newco, a counterpart signature page&nbsp;to the
VEP LLC Operating Agreement documenting Newco&#146;s becoming the Class&nbsp;B
Member;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to each of the other parties
thereto, the VEP LLC Contribution Agreement;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(vii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to VEP LLC, the Supply Agreement;
and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(viii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; to VEP LLC, the Master Services and Supply
Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">At the Closing, Takeda shall duly execute and deliver
to Abbott or Newco, as the case may be:</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Amended and Restated Takeda
Guarantee;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Lupron License and Supply

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">a certificate of an executive
officer of Takeda as to the matters set forth in <b>Section 11.03(c) </b>and <b>11.03(e)
</b>(as to matters regarding Takeda);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Schedule 6.02(h)</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the Amended and Restated Employee
Matters Agreement; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">all other previously undelivered
certificates and other documents required to be delivered by Takeda to Abbott
or Newco, as the case may be, in connection with the Contemplated Transactions.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">At the Closing, VEP LLC shall duly execute and
deliver:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to Abbott, Newco, TAH and TAP, the
Amended and Restated Tax Agreement;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to TAP, the Master Services and
Supply Agreement;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

Supply Agreement; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">to TAP and the TAP Sales Subsidiary,
the VEP LLC Contribution Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3.03</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Closing Balance Sheet; Adjustment of
Estimated Net Assets Differential.</u></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='11',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2910455\11202-1-kc-03.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='May  1 15:00 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">As promptly as practicable, but in any event within 90
Business Days after the Closing Date, TAP shall:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">prepare the TAP Closing Balance
Sheet, the Retained Business Closing Balance Sheet and the Split-off Business
Closing Balance Sheet in accordance with GAAP applied on a basis consistent
with the TAP 2007 Audited Balance Sheet<b>  </b>and
the Agreed Accounting Conventions;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">deliver to Abbott and TAH (A)&nbsp;the
TAP Closing Balance Sheet, together with a report thereon of Deloitte&nbsp;&amp;
Touche LLP (&#147;<u>Deloitte&nbsp;&amp; Touche</u>&#148;) substantially to the effect
that the TAP Closing Balance Sheet presents fairly, in all material respects,
the assets and liabilities of TAP as of the Closing Date, on the basis of
accounting described in a note to the TAP Closing Balance Sheet (which note
shall state in substance that the TAP Closing Balance Sheet reflects the assets
and liabilities of TAP and its Subsidiaries, including Newco and VEP LLC, on a
consolidated basis immediately prior to the Contribution and Assumption, but
after the transactions contemplated by <b>Section&nbsp;7.02(a)&nbsp;</b>and<b> Section&nbsp;7.03</b>, and shall otherwise
describe accounting in accordance with the requirements of <b>Section&nbsp;3.03(a)(i)&nbsp;</b>as the basis
for the TAP Closing Balance Sheet), (B)&nbsp;the Retained Business Closing
Balance Sheet, together with a report thereon of Deloitte&nbsp;&amp; Touche
substantially to the effect that the Retained Business Closing Balance Sheet
presents fairly, in all material respects, the assets and liabilities of TAP as
of the Closing Date, on the basis of accounting described in a note to the
Retained Business Closing Balance Sheet (which note shall state in substance
that the Retained Business Closing Balance Sheet reflects the assets and
liabilities of TAP and its Subsidiaries, including VEP LLC but excluding Newco and its Subsidiary, on a consolidated
basis after the Contribution and Assumption, but prior to the Exchange, and
shall otherwise describe accounting in accordance with the requirements of <b>Section&nbsp;3.03(a)(i)&nbsp;</b>as the basis
for the Retained Business Closing Balance Sheet) and (C)&nbsp;the Split-off
Business Closing Balance Sheet, together with a report thereon of Deloitte&nbsp;&amp;
Touche substantially to the effect that the Split-off Business Closing Balance
Sheet presents fairly, in all material respects, the assets and liabilities of
Newco as of the Closing Date, on the basis of accounting described in a note to
the Split-off Business Closing Balance Sheet (which note shall state in
substance that the Split-off Business Closing Balance Sheet reflects the assets
and liabilities of Newco and its Subsidiary on a consolidated basis after the
Contribution and Assumption, but prior to the Exchange, and shall otherwise describe
accounting in accordance with the requirements of <b>Section&nbsp;3.03(a)(i)&nbsp;</b>as the basis for the Split-off
Business Closing Balance Sheet); and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">prepare and deliver to Abbott and
TAH an explanation of the preparation of the TAP Closing Balance Sheet, the
Retained Business Closing Balance Sheet and the Split-off Business Closing
Balance Sheet in such detail as to permit a reasonable review and analysis
thereof by TAH and Abbott, which explanation shall include general ledger
account-level detail and all relevant analysis and supporting documentation.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p>

<div align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center"></div>
