<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Benefit
Plans to fail to be deductible for United States federal income tax purposes by
virtue of Section&nbsp;280G of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">TAP has not made any payments, is not obligated to
make any payments and is not a party to any agreement or Benefit Plan that
under any circumstances could obligate it to make any payments that will not be
fully deductible under Section&nbsp;280G of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Each Benefit Plan (excluding any Benefit Plan of
Abbott in which employees of TAP participate) is by its terms able to be
amended or terminated by TAP.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">No Benefit Plan is a &#147;nonqualified deferred
compensation plan&#148; within the meaning of Code Section&nbsp;409A(d)(1)&nbsp;that
fails to meet the requirements of any of Code Section&nbsp;409A(a)(2), (3)&nbsp;and
(4), including the Treasury Regulations and any related IRS pronouncements
thereunder (or at any time since December&nbsp;31, 2004 has not been operated
in accordance with such requirements) or provides for the set-aside of assets
for purposes of paying compensation in any manner described in Code Section&nbsp;409A(b)(1)&nbsp;or
(b)(2), including the Treasury Regulations and any related IRS pronouncements
thereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.23</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Inventory</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">All inventory of TAP and the TAP Subsidiaries (whether
or not allocated to contracts in process), including all raw materials, work in
process and finished products, packaging, items purchased for distribution or
resale and items which have been ordered or purchased by TAP or any of the TAP
Subsidiaries and inventory shown on the TAP 2007 Audited Balance Sheet or
acquired thereafter (all of the foregoing, collectively, the &#147;<u>Inventory</u>&#148;)
(i)&nbsp;was acquired or manufactured in the ordinary course of business
consistent with past practice; (ii)&nbsp;is of good and merchantable quality; (iii)&nbsp;is
not mislabeled or mispackaged, and is saleable or usable for the purposes for
which intended; (iv)&nbsp;is not defective, damaged or obsolete, and meets all
quality control standards; (v)&nbsp;in the aggregate is valued on the books of
account, the Audited Financial Statements and the TAP 2007 Audited Balance
Sheet at the lower of cost (on a FIFO basis) or market in which the standard
cost less reserves is no greater than market value (sales price less direct
selling and direct distribution costs), in accordance with GAAP; and (vi)&nbsp;is
free and clear of all Liens.&#160; The TAP
2007 Audited Balance Sheet contains all Inventory reserves that are appropriate
in accordance with GAAP.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The inventory levels of TAP products at its three
largest wholesalers, when measured at the end of each calendar quarter on an
aggregate basis, have not been materially different from January&nbsp;1, 2006
to the date hereof.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.24</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Products Liability</u>.&#160; In connection with the conduct of the
businesses of TAP and each of the TAP Subsidiaries: (a)&nbsp;there are no
developments, events, conditions, circumstances, activities, practices,
incidents, actions, omissions or plans that could reasonably be expected to
give rise to any material Liability or obligation or otherwise form the basis
of any material claim based on or related to any product that is or was
designed, formulated, manufactured, processed, serviced, marketed, distributed
or sold by TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries or any service provided or
allegedly provided by or on behalf of TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries; and (b)&nbsp;all
products, including the packaging and advertising related thereto, </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24</font></p>

<div align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">designed, formulated, manufactured, processed, marketed, sold or placed
in the stream of commerce by or for TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries or any
services provided by or for TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries complied with
all applicable Governmental Authorizations, Laws or applicable industry and
customer standards, and there have not been, and there are no, material defects
or deficiencies in such services or products.&#160;
Neither TAP nor any of the TAP Subsidiaries has made or provided any
warranty (whether written or oral) with respect to the quality or absence of
defects in any of the products it has sold and which is currently in effect
other than warranties that are comparable to those customarily given by
companies similar to TAP in the pharmaceutical business or given by it in the
ordinary course of business consistent with past practice.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.25</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Title and Condition
of Assets</u>.&#160; TAP and the TAP
Subsidiaries have good and marketable title to, or a valid leasehold interest
in, all of the Assets owned, used or held for use by TAP and the TAP
Subsidiaries and necessary or material to the operation of their business as
currently conducted, including all Assets stated on the TAP 2007 Audited Balance
Sheet, free and clear of all Liens, except Permitted Liens.&#160; The Assets used in the conduct of the
businesses of TAP and the TAP Subsidiaries have been well maintained, are in
good operating condition and repair (normal wear and tear excepted), and are adequate
and suitable for the particular purpose for which they are being used or held
for use.&#160; With respect to the Headquarters
Facility and the Leased Facility, as applicable, (a)&nbsp;there are no pending
or threatened condemnation proceedings thereto; (b)&nbsp;there are no leases,
subleases, licenses or agreements, written or oral, granting to any party or
parties the right of use or occupancy of any portion of the Headquarters
Facility (excluding the Headquarters Lease to be entered into at Closing) or
the Leased Facility (other than the leases to TAP or its Subsidiaries being
assigned to Abbott at Closing); (c)&nbsp;no portion thereof has suffered any
material damage by fire or other casualty loss which has not heretofore been
completely repaired and restored to its original condition (ordinary wear and
tear excepted), except as would not, individually or in the aggregate,
reasonably be expected to interfere with the use thereof, or with respect to
any Leased Facility, which has not heretofore been completely repaired and
restored in accordance with the terms of the applicable lease; and (d)&nbsp;there
are no outstanding options or rights of first refusal to purchase the
Headquarters Facility, or any portion thereof or interest therein.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.26</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Accounts Receivable</u>.&#160; Each of the<b>
</b>accounts, notes and other receivables and amounts owing from
customers of TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries to TAP or any of the TAP
Subsidiaries (the &#147;<u>Receivables</u>&#148;) represents arm&#146;s length sales in the
ordinary course of business consistent with past practice, is and will be fully
collectible, constitutes a valid claim of TAP or the TAP Subsidiaries, as
applicable, free and clear of all Liens, and is not and will not be subject to
any valid claims or set off or other defense or counterclaims, except to the
extent of the reserves referred to in the following sentence.&#160; The TAP 2007 Audited Balance Sheet contains
reserves for uncollected Receivables and for returns, each in accordance with
GAAP.&#160; Since December&nbsp;31, 2006, (a)&nbsp;there
have not been any write-offs as uncollectible of any Receivables, except for
write-offs in the ordinary course of business consistent with past practice,
and (b)&nbsp;there has not been a material change in the aggregate amount of
such Receivables and amounts owing to TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries, or
the aging thereof.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.27</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Insurance</u>.&#160; TAP and the TAP Subsidiaries maintain
insurance coverage with insurers, or are self insured, in such amounts and
covering such risks as they in </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">good faith judgment believe to be reasonable for their business, taking
into account the cost and availability of such insurance.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.28</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Books and Records</u>.&#160; The books of account, stock records, minute
books and other corporate and financial records of TAP and each of the TAP
Subsidiaries are complete and correct and have been maintained in accordance
with reasonable business practices for companies similar to such company.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.29</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="color:black;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;">Broker&#146;s
Fees</font></u></font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; Neither TAP nor any of the TAP Subsidiaries
has any liability or obligation to pay any fees or commissions to any broker,
finder, or similar agent in connection with the transactions contemplated by
this Agreement or any other Transaction Document.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.30</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Privacy Laws</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
TAP and each of its employees have complied in all material respects
with and are in compliance in all material respects with all of TAP&#146;s
obligations under the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of
1996 and all regulations adopted by the U.S. Department of Health&nbsp;&amp;
Human Services thereunder, including the privacy standards and the security
standards (collectively, &#147;<u>HIPAA</u>&#148;), as applicable to Protected Health
Information (as defined in HIPAA).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE 5</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;"><br> REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF
ABBOTT</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott hereby represents and warrants to TAH as follows, in each case
as of the date of this Agreement and as of the Closing Date, except in the case
of <b>Section&nbsp;5.06</b>, which
representation and warranty is made only as of the Closing Date:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.01</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Organization</u>.&#160; Abbott is a corporation duly organized,
validly existing and in good standing under the Laws of the State of Illinois.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.02</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Authority; Binding
Obligation</u>.&#160; Abbott has the full and
unrestricted corporate power and authority to execute and deliver this
Agreement and each other Transaction Document to which it is a party, and to
perform its obligations hereunder and thereunder, and to consummate the
Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party.&#160; The execution and delivery by Abbott of this
Agreement and each other Transaction Document to which it is a party, the
performance of its obligations hereunder and thereunder, and the consummation
by Abbott of the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, have been
duly authorized by all necessary corporate action, and no other corporate
proceedings on the part of Abbott are necessary to authorize this Agreement and
each other Transaction Document to which it is a party, and to perform its
obligations hereunder and thereunder, or to consummate the Contemplated
Transactions to which it is a party.&#160;
This Agreement has been duly executed by Abbott and constitutes, and
each other Transaction Document to be executed by Abbott, when executed and
delivered in accordance with the provisions hereof, will constitute, a legal,
valid and binding obligation of Abbott, enforceable in accordance with its
terms, except as such enforceability may be subject to the effect of any
bankruptcy, insolvency, fraudulent conveyance, reorganization, moratorium or
similar Laws affecting creditors&#146; rights generally and subject to </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">26</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the exercise of judicial discretion in accordance with general
equitable principles (whether considered in a Legal Proceeding in equity or at law).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.03</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Non-Contravention;
Required Filings and Consents</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The execution, delivery and performance by Abbott of
this Agreement and each of the other Transaction Documents to which it is a
party, the fulfillment of and compliance with the respective terms and
provisions hereof and thereof, and the consummation by Abbott of the
Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, do not and will not: (i)&nbsp;conflict
with, or violate any provision of, the articles of incorporation or the bylaws
of Abbott or (ii)&nbsp;except as would not materially adversely affect the
ability of Abbott to carry out its obligations under the Transaction Documents
or to consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, (A)&nbsp;conflict
with or violate any Law applicable to Abbott, any of its Subsidiaries or any of
its Assets or (B)&nbsp;result in or require the creation or imposition of, or
result in the acceleration of, any Indebtedness or any Lien of any nature upon,
or with respect to, Abbott or any of its Subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The execution, delivery and performance by Abbott of
this Agreement and each other Transaction Document to which it is a party, the
fulfillment of and compliance with the respective terms and provisions hereof
and thereof, and the consummation by Abbott of the Contemplated Transactions to
which it is a party, do not and will not: (i)&nbsp;require any Third Party
Consent or Governmental Authorization from, or filing with or notification to, any
Person not a party to this Agreement, except as provided under 21 C.F.R. &#167;
314.72(a)(2)&nbsp;and (b), to submit appropriate notification to FDA of the
transfer of ownership of all NDAs or INDs from TAP to Abbott or Newco and
except for those the absence of which would not materially adversely affect the
ability of Abbott to carry out its obligations under the Transaction Documents
or to consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party or (ii)&nbsp;except
as would not materially adversely affect the ability of Abbott to carry out its
obligations under the Transaction Documents or to consummate the Contemplated
Transactions to which it is a party, (A)&nbsp;conflict with, result in any
breach of, constitute a default (with or without notice or lapse of time or
both) under any Contract to which Abbott is a party or by which Abbott or any
of its Assets may be bound or (B)&nbsp;result in or give rise to any penalty,
forfeiture, or restriction on business operations of Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">No Governmental Authority or any other Person has
notified Abbott that such Governmental Authority or other Person intends to
object to the Contemplated Transactions, which shall include for this purpose
any objection to the operation of the Retained Business through TAP as a
Subsidiary of TAH or the Split-off Business through Newco as a Subsidiary of Abbott,
except as would not materially adversely affect the ability of Abbott to
perform its obligations under the Transaction Documents or to consummate the
Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.04</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Ownership of TAP
Stock</u>.&#160; Abbott is the record and
beneficial owner of 100 shares of TAP Class&nbsp;A Common Stock, constituting
all of the Class&nbsp;A Common Stock, free and clear of any and all Liens,
except as provided in the Transaction Documents or TAP&#146;s certificate of
incorporation, and there are no limitations or restrictions on Abbott&#146;s right
to transfer such TAP Class&nbsp;A Common Stock to TAP<b>  </b>pursuant to this Agreement, other than those imposed by
applicable federal and state securities Laws.&#160;
Except for the Transaction Documents </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='27',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2907448\11202-1-kc-07.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='Apr 30 16:16 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and TAP&#146;s certificate of incorporation, such TAP Class&nbsp;A Common
Stock is not subject to (i)&nbsp;any option, warrant, purchase right or other
Contract (other than this Agreement) that could require Abbott or, after the
Closing, TAP, to sell, transfer or otherwise dispose of such TAP Class&nbsp;A
Common Stock or (ii)&nbsp;any voting trust, proxy or other Contract or
understanding with respect to the voting, dividend rights, preferences, sale,
acquisition or other disposition of any of such TAP Class&nbsp;A Common
Stock.&#160; Assuming TAP has the requisite
power and authority to be the lawful owner of such TAP Class&nbsp;A Common
Stock, upon delivery to TAP at the Closing of the certificate or certificates
representing all of such TAP Class&nbsp;A Common Stock, duly endorsed by Abbott
for transfer to TAP or accompanied by a duly completed and executed stock
power, and upon Abbott&#146;s receipt of the Newco Stock, good and valid title to
such TAP Class&nbsp;A Common Stock will pass to TAP, free and clear of any and all
Liens.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.05</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Abbott Defined
Benefit Plan Contributions</u>.&#160; With
respect to contributions to the Abbott Defined Benefit Plan, for either of the (i)&nbsp;two
plan years immediately preceding the Closing Date or (ii)&nbsp;two out of the
three plan years immediately preceding the Closing Date, (x)&nbsp;the aggregate
amount of all contributions made by Abbott and its Affiliates to the Abbott
Defined Benefit Plan constituted greater than ninety percent (90%) of the total
amount of contributions made to the Abbott Defined Benefit Plan during each
plan year and (y)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of all contributions made by TAP
and the TAP Subsidiaries to the Abbott Defined Benefit Plan constituted less
than ten percent (10%) of the total amount of contributions made to the Abbott
Defined Benefit Plan during each plan year.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.06</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Related Intellectual
Property</u>.&#160; To the Knowledge of
Abbott, <u>Schedule 5.06</u> sets forth a complete and accurate list of all
material Identifiable Intellectual Property owned by and material Intellectual
Property licensed to Abbott or any of its Subsidiaries that is used or held for
use in the conduct of the business or operations of TAP or any TAP Subsidiary.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.07</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Affiliated
Transactions</u>.&#160; To the Knowledge of
Abbott, no director, officer or employee of Abbott or the Affiliates of such
individuals (a)&nbsp;owns, directly or indirectly, in whole or in part, any
property, Asset or right, tangible or intangible, which constitutes any Asset
or right owned by TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries or the use of which is
contemplated for the business of TAP or the TAP Subsidiaries, (b)&nbsp;has
filed any patent application which arises out of or relates to any of the
operations of TAP or the TAP Subsidiaries that is not owned by TAP or the TAP
Subsidiaries and has not been assigned to TAP by the inventors or (c)&nbsp;is
currently a party to any transaction or Contract with TAP or any of the TAP
Subsidiaries, including any Contract providing for any loans, advances, the
employment of, furnishing of services by, rental of its Assets from or to, or
otherwise requiring payments to, any such Person.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.08</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Certain Payments</u>.&#160; Neither Abbott nor any of its respective
officers, directors, employees or agents has taken any action that would cause
it to be in violation of the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977, as amended,
or any Applicable Laws of similar effect, in each case with respect to TAP or a
TAP Subsidiary.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;5.09</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Broker&#146;s Fees</u>.&#160; Neither Abbott nor any of its Subsidiaries
has any Contract, arrangement or understanding with any other Person that could
result in TAP, a TAP Subsidiary, or Takeda or any Subsidiary of Takeda becoming
liable or obligated to pay any fees or commissions to any broker, finder, or
similar agent in connection with the Contemplated Transactions.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">28</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE 6</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;"><br> REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF TAH
AND TAKEDA</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.01</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Representations and
Warranties of TAH</u>.&#160; TAH hereby
represents and warrants to Abbott as follows, in each case as of the date of
this Agreement and as of the Closing Date:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Organization</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; TAH is a
corporation duly organized, validly existing and in good standing under the
Laws of the State of New York.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Authority; Binding Obligation</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
TAH has the full and unrestricted corporate power and authority to
execute and deliver this Agreement and each other Transaction Document to which
it is a party, and to perform its obligations hereunder and thereunder, and to
consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party.&#160; The execution and delivery by TAH of this
Agreement and each other Transaction Document to which it is a party, the
performance of its obligations hereunder and thereunder, and the consummation
by TAH of the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, have been duly
authorized by all necessary corporate action, and no other corporate
proceedings on the part of TAH are necessary to authorize this Agreement and
each other Transaction Document to which it is a party, and to perform its
obligations hereunder and thereunder, or to consummate the Contemplated Transactions
to which it is a party.&#160; This Agreement
has been duly executed by TAH and constitutes, and each other Transaction
Document to be executed by TAH, when executed and delivered in accordance with
the provisions hereof, will constitute, a legal, valid and binding obligation
of TAH, enforceable in accordance with its terms, except as such enforceability
may be subject to the effect of any bankruptcy, insolvency, fraudulent
conveyance, reorganization, moratorium or similar Laws affecting creditors&#146;
rights generally and subject to the exercise of judicial discretion in
accordance with general equitable principles (whether considered in a Legal
Proceeding in equity or at law).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Non-Contravention; Required Filings and Consents</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The execution, delivery and
performance by TAH of this Agreement and each of the other Transaction
Documents to which it is a party, the fulfillment of and compliance with the
respective terms and provisions hereof and thereof, and the consummation by TAH
of the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, do not and will not: (A)&nbsp;conflict
with, or violate any provision of, the certificate of incorporation or the
bylaws of TAH or (B)&nbsp;except as would not materially adversely affect the
ability of TAH to carry out its obligations under the Transaction Documents or
to consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, (1)&nbsp;conflict
with or violate any Law applicable to TAH, any of its Subsidiaries or any of
its Assets or (2)&nbsp;result in or require the creation or imposition of, or
result in the acceleration of, any Indebtedness or any Lien of any nature upon,
or with respect to, TAH or any of its Subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The execution, delivery and
performance by TAH of this Agreement and each other Transaction Document to
which it is a party, the fulfillment of and compliance with the respective
terms and provisions hereof and </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">29</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">thereof, and the
consummation by TAH of the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, do
not and will not: (A)&nbsp;require any Third Party Consent or Governmental
Authorization from, or filing with or notification to, any Person not a party
to this Agreement, except where the failure to obtain any Third Party Consent
or Governmental Authorization or to make any filing or notification otherwise
required to be disclosed hereunder would not materially adversely affect the
ability of TAH to carry out its obligations under the Transaction Documents or
to consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, or (B)&nbsp;except
as would not materially adversely affect the ability of TAH to carry out its
obligations under the Transaction Documents or to consummate the Contemplated
Transactions to which it is a party, (1)&nbsp;conflict with, result in any
breach of, constitute a default (with or without notice or lapse of time or
both) under any Contract to which TAH is a party or by which TAH or any of its
Assets may be bound or (2)&nbsp;result in or give rise to any penalty,
forfeiture, or restriction on business operations of TAH.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">No Governmental Authority or any
other Person has notified TAH that such Governmental Authority or other Person
intends to object to the Contemplated Transactions, which shall include for
this purpose any objection to the operation of the Retained Business through
TAP as a Subsidiary of TAH or the Split-off Business through Newco as a
Subsidiary of Abbott, except as would not materially adversely affect the ability
of TAH to perform its obligations under the Transaction Documents or to
consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Affiliated Transactions</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
To the Knowledge of TAH, no director, officer or employee of TAH or the
Affiliates of such individuals (i)&nbsp;owns, directly or indirectly, in whole
or in part, any property, Asset or right, tangible or intangible, which
constitutes any Asset or right owned by TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries or
the use of which is contemplated for the business of TAP or the TAP
Subsidiaries, (ii)&nbsp;has filed any patent application which arises out of or
relates to any of the operations of TAP or the TAP Subsidiaries that is not
owned by TAP or the TAP Subsidiaries and has not been assigned to TAP by the
inventors or (iii)&nbsp;is currently a party to any transaction or Contract
with TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries, including any Contract providing for
any loans, advances, the employment of, furnishing of services by, rental of
its Assets from or to, or otherwise requiring payments to, any such Person.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Certain Payments</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; None of TAH,
any Subsidiaries of TAH or any of their respective officers, directors,
employees or agents has taken any action that would cause any of them to be in
violation of the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977, as amended, or any
Applicable Laws of similar effect, in each case with respect to TAP or a TAP
Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Broker&#146;s Fees</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; Neither TAH
nor any of its Subsidiaries has any Contract, agreement, arrangement or
understanding with any other Person that could result in TAP, a TAP Subsidiary,
Abbott or any of its Subsidiaries becoming liable or obligated to pay any fees
or commissions to any broker, finder, or similar agent in connection with the
Contemplated Transactions.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">30</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.02</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Representations and
Warranties of Takeda</u>.&#160; Takeda hereby
represents and warrants to Abbott as follows, in each case as of the date of
this Agreement and as of the Closing Date, except in the case of<b> Section&nbsp;6.02(h)</b>, which representation
and warranty is made only as of the Closing Date:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Organization</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; Takeda is a
corporation duly organized, validly existing and in good standing under the
Laws of Japan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Authority; Binding Obligation</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Takeda has the full and unrestricted corporate power and authority to
execute and deliver this Agreement and each other Transaction Document to which
it is a party, and to perform its obligations hereunder and thereunder, and to
consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party.&#160; The execution and delivery by Takeda of this
Agreement and each other Transaction Document to which it is a party, the
performance of its obligations hereunder and thereunder, and the consummation
by Takeda of the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, have been
duly authorized by all necessary corporate action, and no other corporate
proceedings on the part of Takeda are necessary to authorize this Agreement and
each other Transaction Document to which it is a party, and to perform its
obligations hereunder and thereunder, or to consummate the Contemplated
Transactions to which it is a party.&#160;
This Agreement has been duly executed by Takeda and constitutes, and
each other Transaction Document to be executed by Takeda, when executed and
delivered in accordance with the provisions hereof, will constitute, a legal,
valid and binding obligation of Takeda, enforceable in accordance with its
terms, except as such enforceability may be subject to the effect of any bankruptcy,
insolvency, fraudulent conveyance, reorganization, moratorium or similar Laws
affecting creditors&#146; rights generally and subject to the exercise of judicial
discretion in accordance with general equitable principles (whether considered
in a Legal Proceeding in equity or at law).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Non-Contravention; Required Filings and Consents</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The execution, delivery and
performance by Takeda of this Agreement and each of the other Transaction
Documents to which it is a party, the fulfillment of and compliance with the
respective terms and provisions hereof and thereof, and the consummation by
Takeda of the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, do not and will
not: (A)&nbsp;conflict with, or violate any provision of, the organizational
documents of Takeda or (B)&nbsp;except as would not materially adversely affect
the ability of Takeda to carry out its obligations under the Transaction
Documents or to consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a
party, (1)&nbsp;conflict with or violate any Law applicable to Takeda, any of
its Subsidiaries or any of its Assets or (2)&nbsp;result in or require the
creation or imposition of, or result in the acceleration of, any Indebtedness
or any Lien of any nature upon, or with respect to, Takeda or any of its
Subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The execution, delivery and
performance by Takeda of this Agreement and each other Transaction Document to
which it is a party, the fulfillment of and compliance with the respective
terms and provisions hereof and thereof, and the consummation by Takeda of the
Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party, do not and will not: (A)&nbsp;require
any Third Party Consent or Governmental Authorization from, or filing with or
notification to, any Person not </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">31</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">a party to this
Agreement, except for those the absence of which would not materially adversely
affect the ability of Takeda to perform its obligations under the Transaction
Documents or to consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a
party, or (B)&nbsp;except as would not materially adversely affect the ability
of Takeda to carry out its obligations under the Transaction Documents or to
consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party,
(1)&nbsp;conflict with, result in any breach of, constitute a default (with or
without notice or lapse of time or both) under any Contract to which Takeda is
a party or by which Takeda or any of its Assets may be bound or (2)&nbsp;result
in or give rise to any penalty, forfeiture, or restriction on business operations
of Takeda.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160; </font>No Governmental Authority or any
other Person has notified Takeda that such Governmental Authority or other
Person intends to object to the Contemplated Transactions, which shall include
for this purpose any objection to the operation of the Retained Business
through TAP as a Subsidiary of TAH or the Split-off Business through Newco as a
Subsidiary of Abbott, except as would not materially adversely affect the
ability of Takeda to perform its obligations under the Transaction Documents or
to consummate the Contemplated Transactions to which it is a party.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Affiliated Transactions</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
To the Knowledge of Takeda, no director, officer or employee of Takeda
or the Affiliates of such individuals (i)&nbsp;owns, directly or indirectly, in
whole or in part, any property, Asset or right, tangible or intangible, which
constitutes any Asset or right owned by TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries or
the use of which is contemplated for the business of TAP or the TAP
Subsidiaries, (ii)&nbsp;has filed any patent application which arises out of or
relates to any of the operations of TAP or the TAP Subsidiaries that is not
owned by TAP or the TAP Subsidiaries and has not been assigned to TAP by the
inventors or (iii)&nbsp;is currently a party to any transaction or Contract
with TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries, including any Contract providing for
any loans, advances, the employment of, furnishing of services by, rental of
its Assets from or to, or otherwise requiring payments to, any such Person.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Certain Payments</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; None of
Takeda, any Subsidiaries of Takeda or any of their respective officers,
directors, employees or agents has taken any action that would cause any of
them to be in violation of the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977, as
amended, or any Applicable Laws of similar effect, in each case with respect to
TAP or a TAP Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Broker&#146;s Fees</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160; Neither
Takeda nor any of its Subsidiaries has any Contract, agreement, arrangement or
understanding with any other Person that could result in TAP, a TAP Subsidiary,
Abbott or any of its Subsidiaries becoming liable or obligated to pay any fees
or commissions to any broker, finder, or similar agent in connection with the
Contemplated Transactions.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Ownership of TAH Stock</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
Takeda is the direct owner of all of the outstanding capital stock of
TAH.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Related Intellectual Property</font></u><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">.&#160;
To the Knowledge of Takeda, <u>Schedule 6.02(h)</u>&nbsp;sets forth a
complete and accurate list of all necessary or material Identifiable </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Intellectual
Property owned by or licensed to Takeda or any of its Subsidiaries that is used
or held for use in the conduct of the business or operations of TAP or any TAP
Subsidiary, excluding any Intellectual Property licensed to TAP under (i)&nbsp;that
certain TAK-390 License Agreement by and between Takeda and TAP dated February&nbsp;17,
2004, (ii)&nbsp;that certain Leuprolide Sustained Release Formulation License
Agreement dated March&nbsp;6, 1989, as amended, by and between Takeda and TAP
and (iii)&nbsp;that certain Lansoprazole License Agreement dated June&nbsp;7,
1995, as amended, by and between Takeda and TAP.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE 7</font></b></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">COVENANTS REGARDING TAP</font></u></b></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:none;text-transform:uppercase;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.01</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Conduct Until the
Closing</u>.&#160; From<b>  </b>the date of this Agreement until the
Closing, unless otherwise expressly required by this Agreement or as mutually
agreed in writing by Abbott and TAH, TAH and Abbott shall each instruct TAP to
(and, if applicable, vote to cause TAP to) and TAP shall (a)&nbsp;carry on its
business only in the ordinary course of business consistent with past practice
and in material compliance with all Applicable Laws and the requirements of all
TAP Contracts, including the Plea and Related Agreements,<b>  </b>and<b>  </b>(b)&nbsp;use
commercially reasonable efforts to (i)&nbsp;preserve intact its business
organization and Assets, (ii)&nbsp;maintain its rights and franchises, (iii)&nbsp;retain
the services of its officers and employees, (iv)&nbsp;maintain its
relationships with customers, suppliers, distributors, landlords, licensors,
licensees and other Persons having business dealings with it and (v)&nbsp;keep
in full force and effect liability insurance and bonds comparable in amount and
scope of coverage to that currently maintained.&#160;
Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, (A)&nbsp;from the date
of this Agreement until the Closing, unless otherwise expressly required by
this Agreement or as mutually agreed in writing by Abbott and TAH, (x)&nbsp;TAP
shall not, and shall cause Newco, VEP LLC and each of the other TAP
Subsidiaries not to, take or commit to take any of the following actions: (i)&nbsp;sell
or otherwise dispose of any Assets, other than in the ordinary course of
business consistent with past practice, (ii)&nbsp;enter into, terminate, amend
or modify any TAP Material Contract or (iii)&nbsp;enter into or engage in a
line of business not conducted by TAP on the date of this Agreement, (y)&nbsp;TAP
shall not, and shall cause each TAP Subsidiary not to, (i)&nbsp;terminate, hire
or otherwise engage any individual at grade level 19 or higher to be engaged in
the Split-off Business without the prior written consent of Abbott, (ii)&nbsp;terminate,
hire or otherwise engage any individual at grade level 19 or higher to be
engaged in the Retained Business without the prior written consent of TAH or (iii)&nbsp;change
the primary association of any employee as between the Split-off Business and
the Retained Business and (z)&nbsp;TAP shall cause Newco not to take any
actions other than actions necessary or appropriate in furtherance of the
Contemplated Transactions <font color="black" style="color:black;">and
(B)&nbsp;unless agreed in writing by Abbott, no consent or waiver executed or given
prior to the Closing by or on behalf of Newco or Newco Lupron Sales Subsidiary
under or with respect to any agreement constituting a Transaction Document
shall be effective, valid, binding or enforceable.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.02</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Restructuring of TAP
Subsidiaries</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The Parties acknowledge that certain Assets to be
transferred to Newco and certain Liabilities to be assumed by Newco are
currently held by other TAP </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">33</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Subsidiaries.&#160; Consequently, immediately prior to the
Contribution and Assumption, TAP shall cause:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the TAP Finance Subsidiary to merge,
in accordance with all Applicable Laws, including the General Corporation Law
of the State of Delaware, with and into TAP, such that the separate corporate existence
of the TAP Finance Subsidiary will cease and TAP will continue its corporate
existence and shall be the surviving corporation in such merger; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the TAP Sales Subsidiary to</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.75in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(A)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">form, in accordance with all
Applicable Laws, including the General Corporation Law of the State of
Delaware, a subsidiary corporation incorporated in the state of Delaware (&#147;<u>Newco
Lupron Sales Subsidiary</u>&#148;),</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:135.35pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(B)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">contribute to Newco Lupron Sales
Subsidiary, in exchange for all of the issued and outstanding stock of the
Newco Lupron Sales Subsidiary, all Lupron Employees employed by and all
Transferred Assets and Assumed Liabilities held by the TAP Sales Subsidiary
immediately prior to the Contribution and Assumption free and clear of all
Liens running in favor of TAP or any TAP Subsidiary other than Newco Lupron
Sales Subsidiary, and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:135.35pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:2.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(C)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">distribute all of the issued and
outstanding stock of Newco Lupron Sales Subsidiary to TAP, such that Newco
Lupron Sales Subsidiary becomes a direct and wholly-owned subsidiary of TAP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Immediately after the Closing or at any time
thereafter, TAP in its sole discretion may establish a successor (new
Subsidiary) to the TAP Finance Subsidiary, contribute any or all of the
Retained Assets, Retained Liabilities and Retained Employees to such Subsidiary
and cause such Subsidiary to engage in (among other things) the business and
operations conducted by the TAP Finance Subsidiary prior to the Closing.&#160; Newco shall indemnify TAP against, and hold
TAP harmless from, fifty percent (50%) of (i)&nbsp;the amount of any state Tax
advantages lost by TAP resulting from the inability to utilize the new
Subsidiary in accordance with past practice (during the ninety (90) day period
following the Closing) and any state Taxes incurred by TAP arising out of the
merger of the TAP Finance Subsidiary into TAP and (ii)&nbsp;the reasonable
out-of-pocket expenses incurred by TAP within ninety (90) days of the Closing
Date in establishing such new Subsidiary and qualifying such new Subsidiary to
do business in all applicable states, in each case except to the extent any
such amount is accrued or reserved for on the TAP Closing Balance Sheet or
incurred as an expense by TAP prior to the Closing and thus reflected on the
TAP Closing Balance Sheet; <u>provided</u> that Newco shall not be required to
indemnify TAP for the loss of any Tax benefit, which loss is attributable to
any decrease in sales or assets of TAP and/or its Subsidiaries as a result of
the Contemplated Transactions or to any period after the ninety (90) day period
immediately following the Closing Date.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">34</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
