<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">power or
privilege.&#160; Subject to <b>Section&nbsp;12.09</b>, the rights and remedies
provided under this Agreement shall be cumulative and not exclusive of any
rights or remedies provided by Law.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.03&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u>Expenses</u>.&#160; Except as otherwise provided in this
Agreement and the other Transaction Documents, each Party shall be responsible
for all costs and expenses incurred by such Party in connection with the
Contemplated Transactions, including the fees of such Party&#146;s legal counsel,
financial advisors, accountants, brokers, finders or investment bankers; <u>provided</u>
that, until after the Closing, TAP shall not incur any out-of-pocket cost or
expense (or series of related out-of-pocket costs and/or expenses) related to
or arising from the Contemplated Transactions in excess of $250,000, unless
such cost or expense (or series of related costs and/or expenses)<b>  </b>is approved in writing in advance by both
TAH and Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.04&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u>Successors and
Assigns</u>.&#160; The provisions of this
Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the Parties and
their respective successors and permitted assigns; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>,
that no Party may assign, delegate or otherwise transfer any of its rights or
obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of each
other Party, except that each of Abbott, Newco, TAH and TAP may transfer or
assign, in whole or from time to time in part, to one or more of its Affiliates,
its rights under this Agreement, but no such transfer or assignment shall
relieve Abbott or TAH of its obligations under this Agreement.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, either Abbott
or Takeda may assign this Agreement to any entity which is the successor to its
entire business and operations without the prior written consent of any other
Party.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.05&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u>Dispute Resolution</u>.&#160; Any and all disputes arising out of or
relating to this Agreement, any other Transaction Document or any of the
Contemplated Transactions, including any question regarding the existence,
validity or termination or the applicability of this <b>Section&nbsp;15.05</b>, shall be subject to <b>Section&nbsp;15.10</b> and to the following
provisions; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, any dispute arising out of or
relating to any Transaction Document (other than this Agreement) containing
specific dispute resolution provisions shall be subject to the dispute
resolution provisions contained in such other Transaction Document if and to
the extent they conflict with the provisions in this <b>Section&nbsp;15.05</b>:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Any and all disputes arising out of
or relating to any balance sheet, financial statement or audit report
contemplated by <b>Sections 3.03(a)(i)&nbsp;</b>or
arising out of or relating to the determination of the Estimated Split-off
Business Net Assets and the Estimated TAP Net Assets as contemplated by <b>Section&nbsp;10.14</b> shall be resolved
exclusively in accordance with this <b>Section&nbsp;15.05(a)</b>.&#160; Abbott and TAH shall first attempt to
reconcile their differences.&#160; If for any
reason the Parties are unable to reach a written resolution as to all disputed
items within ten (10)&nbsp;Business Days of receipt of a written notice of
dispute by the other Party, TAH and Abbott shall submit the items remaining in
dispute for resolution to PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (the &#147;<u>Independent
Accounting Firm</u>&#148;); <u>provided</u> that, if such firm is unable or
unwilling to serve, the Independent Accounting Firm shall be another accounting
firm mutually selected by TAH and Abbott or, if no agreement can be reached,
the largest accounting firm (in terms of revenue) with offices in Chicago,
Illinois that is able and willing to serve.&#160;
TAH and Abbott shall instruct the Independent Accounting Firm to
determine and report in writing upon each of the submitted disputed items,
which, to the extent consisting of financial statement items, shall be
determined by the Independent Accounting Firm in accordance with GAAP applied
on a basis consistent with the TAP 2007 Audited Balance Sheet and the Agreed
Accounting Conventions.&#160; </font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">60</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='60',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2907448\11202-1-kc-13.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='Apr 30 17:34 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Such report of
the Independent Accounting Firm shall be final, binding, conclusive and
non-appealable for all purposes hereunder.&#160;
TAH and Abbott shall instruct the Independent Accounting Firm to use its
best efforts to render a decision as to all items in dispute within thirty (30)
days of submission, and the Parties agree to cooperate with each other and the
Representatives of the other and with the Independent Accounting Firm in order
that any and all items in dispute shall be resolved as soon as
practicable.&#160; The fees and disbursements
of the Independent Accounting Firm shall be allocated between TAH and Abbott in
the same proportion that the aggregate dollar amount of disputed items
submitted to the Independent Accounting Firm that are unsuccessfully disputed
by each such Party (as finally determined by the Independent Accounting Firm)
bears to the total dollar amount of disputed items so submitted.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Any and all disputes arising out of
or related to Section&nbsp;3.4(b)(ii)-(iv)&nbsp;or Section&nbsp;9.3(b)&nbsp;of
the VEP LLC Operating Agreement or any Third Party Royalty as contemplated by <b>Section&nbsp;14.01 </b>and all disputes
referred to arbitration pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;15.05(c)&nbsp;</b>shall
be referred to and finally resolved by arbitration under the Rules&nbsp;of
Arbitration of the International Chamber of Commerce (the &#147;<u>ICC</u>&#148;) then in
effect (the &#147;<u>Rules</u>&#148;), which Rules&nbsp;are deemed to be incorporated by
reference into this clause.&#160; The number
of arbitrators shall be three.&#160; The place
of arbitration shall be Chicago, Illinois.&#160;
The language of the arbitral </font>proceedings shall be
English.&#160; It is the intent of the Parties
that discovery (if any) in the arbitration shall be kept to a minimum and no
more than reasonably necessary, in the judgment of the arbitrators, to resolve
the dispute, and that the arbitration proceed expeditiously.&#160; Settlement negotiations, including any
statements made therein, shall not be admissible under any circumstances.&#160; The arbitrators are not empowered to award
punitive damages, and each Party hereby waives any right to seek or recover
punitive damages with respect to any dispute resolved by arbitration. The
arbitrators shall allocate the costs of the arbitration in a manner that bears
a reasonable relationship to the outcome of the arbitration, with the party to
the arbitration prevailing on more issues, or on issues of greater value or
gravity, recovering a relatively larger share of its legal fees and expenses
and the administrative and arbitrator fees and expenses.&#160; Judgment upon any award rendered by the
arbitrators may be entered in any court having jurisdiction thereof.&#160; Except as required by Law or regulatory
authority or as necessary to enforce this agreement to arbitrate or any award
rendered thereunder, the existence of the dispute, any settlement negotiations,
the arbitration hearing, any submissions (including exhibits, testimony,
proposed rulings and briefs) and the rulings shall be deemed Confidential
Information.&#160; The arbitrators shall have
the authority to impose sanctions for unauthorized disclosure of any such
Confidential Information.</p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
and all disputes not expressly covered by <b>Sections
15.05(a)&nbsp;</b>and <b>(b)&nbsp;</b>arising
out of or relating to this Agreement (including all matters arising under <b>Article&nbsp;12</b>), any other Transaction
Document (to the extent not covered by any specific dispute resolution
provisions contained in such Transaction Document) shall be subject to the
following.&#160; If any Party files an action,
it shall do so only in the Delaware Court of Chancery in Wilmington, Delaware
(the &#147;<u>Chancery Court</u>&#148;), <u>provided</u>, if, and only if, the claim(s)&nbsp;are
not within the jurisdiction of the Chancery Court, such dispute or portion
thereof shall be referred to arbitration in accordance with <b>Section&nbsp;15.05(b)</b>.&#160; Each Party hereby covenants and agrees to
submit to the jurisdiction of the Chancery Court, where proper, for the limited
purpose of resolution of the dispute, and to refrain from filing any such
action in any other court, either within or outside of </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">61</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='61',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2907448\11202-1-kc-13.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='Apr 30 17:34 2008' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">the United
States.&#160; Each Party specifically waives
any and all rights to a jury trial upon litigation of any issue, dispute or
matter whatsoever related or incident to this Agreement irrespective of the
Party bringing such suit.&#160; Service of
process may be made to any Party and personal jurisdiction over such Party
obtained, by service of a copy of the summons, complaint and other pleadings
required to make such application by certified mail upon such Party at the
address set forth in <b>Section&nbsp;15.01</b>.&#160; This method of service is in addition to, and
not to the exclusion of, any methods of process service available at law or in
equity.&#160; Each Party hereby waives and
agrees not to assert by way of motion, as a defense, or otherwise in any such
action brought in accordance with this <b>Section&nbsp;15.05(c)</b>,
any claim that the court does not have jurisdiction over it or that the action
is brought in an inconvenient forum, that the venue of the action is improper,
or that this section may not be enforced in or by such court.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.06&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u>Governing
Law</u>.&#160; </font>This Agreement and each of the Transaction
Documents (except as otherwise explicitly provided therein) shall be governed
by, and all disputes arising out of or in connection with this Agreement and
each of the Transaction Documents (except as otherwise explicitly provided
therein) shall be resolved in accordance with, the Law of the State of Delaware
(without regard to the conflicts of law rules&nbsp;of such state that would
mandate the application of the laws of another jurisdiction).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.07&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Counterparts;
Effectiveness</u>.&#160; This Agreement may be
signed in any number of counterparts, each of which shall be an original, with
the same effect as if the signatures were upon the same instrument.&#160; This Agreement shall become effective when
each Party shall have received a counterpart of such agreement signed by the
other Parties to such agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.08&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Entire
Agreement</u>.&#160; This Agreement and the
other Transaction Documents constitute the entire agreement among the Parties
with respect to the subject matter of such documents and supersede all prior
and contemporaneous agreements, understandings and negotiations, both written
and oral, between the Parties with respect to the subject matter of such
documents.&#160; No representation,
inducement, promise, understanding, condition or warranty not set forth in the
Transaction Documents has been made or relied upon by any Party.&#160; Except for Indemnified Parties under <b>Article&nbsp;12</b>, neither this Agreement nor
any provision hereof is intended to confer upon any Person other than the
Parties any rights or remedies thereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.09&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Severability</u>.&#160; Except as otherwise expressly provided
herein, if any one or more of the provisions contained in this Agreement should
be declared invalid, illegal or unenforceable in any respect, the validity,
legality and enforceability of the remaining provisions contained in this
Agreement shall not in any way be affected or impaired thereby so long as the
economic or legal substance of the Contemplated Transactions is not affected in
any manner materially adverse to any Party.&#160;
Upon such a declaration, the Parties shall modify this Agreement so as
to effect the original intent of the Parties as closely as possible in an
acceptable manner so that the Contemplated Transactions are consummated as
originally contemplated to the fullest extent possible.&#160; It is the intention of the Parties that if
any restriction or covenant contained in <b>Section&nbsp;8.01</b>
or <b>Section&nbsp;9.02</b>, as
applicable, is held to cover a geographic area or to be for a length of time
that is not permitted by Applicable Law, or is in any way construed to be to
any extent invalid, such provision shall not be construed to be invalid, but to
the extent such provision would be valid or enforceable under Applicable Law,
the applicable section shall be construed and interpreted or reformed to
provide for a covenant having the maximum </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">62</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">enforceable geographic area, time period and other provisions (but not
greater than those contained in <b>Section&nbsp;8.01</b>
or <b>Section&nbsp;9.02</b>, as
applicable).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.10&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Specific
Performance</u>.&#160; Each of the Parties
acknowledges and agrees that in the event of any breach of this Agreement, a
non-breaching Party could be irreparably and immediately harmed and could not
be made whole by monetary damages.&#160; It is
accordingly agreed that each of the Parties (a)&nbsp;will waive, in any action
for specific performance, the defense of a remedy at law and (b)&nbsp;shall be
entitled, in addition to any other remedy to which it may be entitled at law or
in equity, to seek an injunction to prevent breaches of, and to compel specific
performance of, this Agreement.&#160; In
particular, without limitation, each of TAH and TAP, on the one hand, and
Abbott and Newco, on the other hand, acknowledges that the other Parties would
be irreparably harmed by any breach of <b>Section&nbsp;8.01</b>
or <b>Section&nbsp;9.02</b>, as
applicable, and that there would be no adequate remedy at law to compensate
such other Parties for any such breach.&#160;
TAH and TAP, on the one hand, and Abbott and Newco, on the other hand,
each agree that the other Parties shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief
requiring specific performance in the event of a breach of <b>Section&nbsp;8.01</b> or <b>Section&nbsp;9.02</b>, as applicable, and each
of such Parties consents to the entry of such injunctive relief.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.11&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>No
Right to Setoff</u>.&#160; Except as provided
in <b>Section&nbsp;3.04(a)</b>, no Party
nor any Affiliate thereof may deduct from, set off, hold back or otherwise
reduce in any manner whatsoever any amount owed to it hereunder or pursuant to
any other agreement against any amounts owed hereunder or pursuant to any other
agreement by such Party and/or its Affiliates to any other Party or any of such
other Party&#146;s Affiliates.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.12&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Third
Parties</u>.&#160; The Indemnified Parties
other than the Parties are third party beneficiaries of this Agreement in
accordance with its terms, and (a)&nbsp;any amendment of this Agreement
executed by the Parties is binding on such Indemnified Parties, (b)&nbsp;any
action or consent taken or given by Takeda, TAH, TAP or VEP LLC on its behalf
is binding upon the TAP Indemnified Parties and the TAH Indemnified Parties and
(c)&nbsp;any action or consent taken or given by Abbott or Newco on its own
behalf is binding upon the Abbott Indemnified Parties and the Newco Indemnified
Parties.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.13&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Construction</u>.&#160; For purposes of this Agreement: (a)&nbsp;words
in the singular shall be held to include the plural and vice versa and words of
one gender shall be held to include the other genders as the context requires; (b)&nbsp;the
terms &#147;hereof,&#148; &#147;herein,&#148; and &#147;herewith&#148; and words of similar import shall,
unless otherwise stated, be construed to refer to this Agreement as a whole and
not to any particular provision of this Agreement; (c)&nbsp;the word &#147;including&#148;
and words of similar import shall mean &#147;including, without limitation,&#148; unless
otherwise specified; (d)&nbsp;all references to a &#147;Section,&#148; &#147;Article,&#148; &#147;Schedule,&#148;
&#147;Attachment&#148; and &#147;Exhibit&#148; are, unless otherwise specified, intended to refer
to a Section, Article, Schedule, Attachment and Exhibit&nbsp;of this Agreement;
and (e)&nbsp;the phrase &#147;attorneys&#146; fees&#148; shall be limited to fees paid or
payable to outside counsel.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.14&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Descriptive
Headings</u>.&#160; The headings contained in
this Agreement and in any Attachment, Exhibit&nbsp;or Schedule attached hereto
are for reference purposes only and shall not affect in any way the meaning or
interpretation of this Agreement.&#160; Any
capitalized term used in any Attachment, Exhibit&nbsp;or Schedule attached
hereto but not otherwise defined therein, shall have the meaning assigned to
such term in this Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">63</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.15&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>No
Partnership or Joint Venture</u>.&#160; It is
not the intention of the Parties to create a partnership (including a limited
partnership) or joint venture, and neither TAP nor Newco shall be a partner or
joint venturer of the other for any purpose, in each case except with respect
to VEP LLC for income tax purposes.&#160;
Neither TAP nor Newco shall be considered the agent of the other for any
purpose whatsoever.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.16&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Obligations
of Takeda</u>.&#160; Notwithstanding anything
to the contrary herein, Takeda is entering into this Agreement solely with
regard to: (i)&nbsp;its obligation to execute and deliver the Amended and
Restated Takeda Guarantee pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;3.02(e)</b>;
(ii)&nbsp;its confidentiality obligations under <b>Section&nbsp;10.06</b>; (iii)&nbsp;its obligation to execute and
deliver the Lupron License and Supply Agreement under <b>Section&nbsp;3.02(e)</b>; (iv)&nbsp;its rights
of access and to information under <b>Section&nbsp;7.04</b>;
(v)&nbsp;its representations and warranties in <b>Section&nbsp;6.02</b>; (vi)&nbsp;its obligations under <b>Sections 7.05</b>, <b>8.01</b>, <b>10.01</b>, <b>10.15</b>, <b>14.01</b>,
<b>15.05</b> and <b>15.17</b>; and (vii)&nbsp;its rights under <b>Sections 3.02(a)&nbsp;</b>and <b>15.04</b>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;15.17&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<u>Effect
of Amendment and Restatement</u>.&#160; The
Parties agree that this Agreement, in amending and restating the Original
Agreement, shall not affect any liability accrued under the Original
Agreement.&#160; Except as the context
requires otherwise, references in any other Transaction Document to the
Original Agreement shall be deemed to be to this Agreement from and after the
Closing Date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<i>Signature
Page&nbsp;Follows</i>]</font></p>

  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:76.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">VEP Licenses</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="19%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:19.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.03(b)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:76.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">VEP LLC</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="19%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:19.62%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Preamble</font></p>
  </td>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-1',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2907448\11202-1-kc-17.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='Apr 30 17:51 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Capitalized terms used but not otherwise defined in this Agreement
shall have the respective meanings set forth as follows in this <u>Exhibit&nbsp;I</u>:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Abbott Defined Benefit Plan</u>&#148; means the Abbott Laboratories
Annuity Retirement Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Abbott Indemnified Parties</u>&#148; means Abbott, its Affiliates and
each of their respective Representatives.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Abbott Laboratories Inc.</u>&#148; means Abbott Laboratories Inc., a
Delaware corporation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Abbott-Canada</u>&#148; means Abbott Laboratories, Limited &#150;
Laboratoires Abbott, Limitee, a corporation organized and existing under the
Canada Business Corporations Act.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Abbott-Puerto Rico</u>&#148; means Abbott Laboratories (Puerto Rico)
Incorporated, a corporation organized and existing under the laws of Puerto
Rico.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Accounts Receivable Reserve Factor</u>&#148; means the quotient obtained
by dividing (x)&nbsp;one (1.00) by (y)&nbsp;0.9989.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Affiliate</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, any other Person
directly or indirectly controlling, controlled by, or under common control with
such other Person.&#160; For purposes of this
definition, &#147;control,&#148; when used with respect to any Person, means the power to
direct management and policies of such Person, directly or indirectly, whether
through the ownership of voting securities, by Contract or otherwise, and the
terms &#147;controlling&#148; and &#147;controlled&#148; shall have meanings correlative to the foregoing;
<u>provided</u> that (i)&nbsp;neither TAP nor any Subsidiary of TAP shall be
deemed an Affiliate of Abbott or any Subsidiary of Abbott or, prior to the
Closing, Takeda or any Subsidiary of Takeda and (ii)&nbsp;neither Abbott nor
any Subsidiary of Abbott, and, prior to the Closing, neither Takeda nor any
Subsidiary of Takeda, shall be deemed an Affiliate of TAP or any Subsidiary of
TAP.&#160; Notwithstanding anything to the
contrary in this Agreement or any other Transaction Document, for purposes of
all Transaction Documents: (i)&nbsp;VEP LLC is an Affiliate of TAP, (ii)&nbsp;upon
the Closing, VEP LLC shall be an Affiliate of Takeda, (iii)&nbsp;prior to the
Closing, VEP LLC is an Affiliate of Newco, (iv)&nbsp;upon and after the
Closing, VEP LLC shall not be deemed to be an Affiliate of Newco and (v)&nbsp;at
no point shall VEP LLC be deemed to be an Affiliate of Abbott or any of its
Affiliates.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Affiliated Group</u>&#148; means a group as defined in Section&nbsp;1504
of the Code (or any analogous combined, consolidated or unitary group defined
under state, local or foreign income Tax law).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Agreed Accounting Conventions</u>&#148; means the measurement of
particular Assets and Liabilities, and the other<b>  </b>policies, as set forth in <u>Exhibit&nbsp;IV</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Amended and Restated Abbott Guarantee</u>&#148;
means the Amended and Restated Guarantee, dated as of March&nbsp;19, 2008 and
amended and restated as of the Closing Date, by Abbott for the benefit of TAP,
TAH and Takeda.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-2</font></p>

2008 and amended and restated as of the Closing Date, by and among Abbott,
Takeda, TAH, TAP and Newco.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

and Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Amended and Restated TAP &#150; Abbott Canada
Marketing and Distribution Agreement</u>&#148; means that certain Amended and
Restated Marketing and Distribution Agreement, dated as of December 1, 2005,
between TAP and Abbott-Canada, as amended prior to the effectiveness of the
Amendment to Marketing and Distribution Agreement (Canada).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Amended and Restated Tax Agreement</u>&#148;
means the Tax Agreement, dated as of March&nbsp;19, 2008 and amended and
restated as of the Closing Date, by and among TAH, Abbott, TAP, Newco and VEP
LLC.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Amendment to Marketing and Distribution
Agreement (Canada)</u>&#148; means the Amendment, dated as of the Closing Date,
between TAP and Abbott-Canada, to the Amended and Restated TAP &#150; Abbott Canada
Marketing and Distribution Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Amendment to Marketing and Distribution
Agreement (Puerto Rico)</u>&#148; means the Amendment, dated as of the Closing Date,
between TAP and Abbott-Puerto Rico, to the TAP &#150; Abbott-Puerto Rico Marketing
and Distribution Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Amendment to Prev-Pac Co-Promotion
Agreement</u>&#148; means the Fourth Amendment, dated as of the Closing Date,
between TAP Sales Subsidiary and Abbott Laboratories Inc. to the Agreement
dated as of May 1, 1998, as amended, by and between Abbott Laboratories Inc.
and TAP Sales Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Applicable Law</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, any U.S. or
non-U.S., federal, state or local constitution, statute, law, ordinance, rule,
administrative interpretation, regulation, order, writ, injunction, directive,
judgment, decree or other requirement of any Governmental Authority applicable
to such Person or any of its Affiliates or any of their respective properties,
Assets or Representatives (in connection with such Representative&#146;s activities
on behalf of such Person or any of its Affiliates).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Asoprisnil</u>&#148; means any compound to which TAP or any of the TAP
Subsidiaries is licensed or otherwise granted rights or permission under and
pursuant to that certain R&amp;D Collaboration, License and Supply Agreement by
and between Jenapharm GmbH&nbsp;&amp; Co. KG (now Schering AG) and TAP dated September&nbsp;8,
1997, as amended, immediately prior to the Closing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Asoprisnil Products</u>&#148; means all Pharmaceutical Products
containing Asoprisnil.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Assets</u>&#148; means assets and rights of every kind (whether
inchoate, tangible or intangible), including real and personal property.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Assumed Ilaprazole Profit Amount</u>&#148; has the meaning specified in
the definition of Ilaprazole Profits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Assumed Liabilities</u>&#148; means:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all Liabilities relating primarily<b>  </b>to the Split-off Business, the Split-off
Products, the Transferred Assets or, to the extent expressly provided in the
Amended and Restated Employee Matters Agreement, the Lupron Employees or to the
extent arising out of the conduct of the Split-off Business;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; other Liabilities expressly allocated to
Newco pursuant to this Agreement or any other Transaction Document, including
all Liabilities reflected on the Split-off Business Closing Balance Sheet; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all Liabilities of TAP under the Plea
and Related Agreements to the extent (if any) that such Liabilities are imposed
on Newco pursuant to the terms of the Plea and Related Agreements or otherwise
by operation of law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Assumed Lupron Profit Amount</u>&#148; has the meaning specified in the
definition of Lupron Profits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Assumed Prevacid Profit Amount</u>&#148; has the meaning specified in
the definition of Prevacid Profits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Assumed TAK-390 MR Profit Amount</u>&#148; has the meaning specified in
the definition of TAK-390 MR Profits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Assumed Uloric Profit Amount</u>&#148; has the meaning specified in the
definition of Uloric Profits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Audited Financial Statements</u>&#148; means the audited consolidated
balance sheets of TAP and the TAP Subsidiaries as of the end of the fiscal
years ending in each of 2007 and 2006, including the notes thereto, and the
audited consolidated statements of income, stockholders&#146; equity and cash flows
for the fiscal years ending in each of 2007 and 2006, including the notes
thereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Base Transaction Conventions</u>&#148; means the document, containing
certain conventions governing the Contemplated Transactions, set forth in <u>Exhibit&nbsp;VII</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Benefit Plan</u>&#148; shall mean each employee benefit plan
constituting an Employee Welfare Benefit Plan, an Employee Pension Benefit Plan
and each other employee benefit or fringe benefit plan, program, arrangement,
or employment practice and each employment agreement, severance agreement,
restrictive covenant, executive compensation arrangement, incentive program or arrangement,
sick leave, vacation pay and severance pay policy, plant closing benefit,
salary continuation arrangement for disability, consulting or other
compensation arrangement, retirement plan, deferred compensation plan, &#147;rabbi&#148;
trust, bonus program, stock purchase arrangement, hospitalization, medical or
health plan, life insurance plan, voluntary employees&#146; beneficiary association
(intended to qualify under Section&nbsp;501(c)(9)&nbsp;of the Code), </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-4</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">tuition reimbursement or scholarship program, workers&#146; compensation
plan or plan providing benefits or payments to employees in the event of a
change of control, change in ownership or sale of all or a substantial portion
of the Assets of TAP maintained by TAP with respect to any of TAP&#146;s current or
former employees or to which TAP contributes or is required to contribute with
respect to any of TAP&#146;s current or former employees; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>,
the term &#147;Benefit Plan&#148; shall not include any Benefit Plan that is sponsored by
Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Business Day</u>&#148; means a day other than a Saturday, Sunday or
other day on which commercial banks in Chicago, Illinois are authorized or
required by Law to close.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Cap Reference Date</u>&#148; means with respect to any claim for
indemnity brought pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;12.03
</b>or <b>Section&nbsp;12.04</b>,
the first day of the month in which the Indemnifying Party receives written
notice of such claim.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Capital Contribution</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the
VEP LLC Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Category 1 Matter</u>&#148; means any Pre-Closing TAP Matter relating to
Prevacid Products, TAK-390 MR Products, Ilaprazole Products, Uloric Products,
Lupron Products, Asoprisnil Products or SARM Products, including to the sales
and marketing practices of TAP, any TAP Subsidiary or anyone acting on behalf
of TAP or any TAP Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Category 2 Matter</u>&#148; means any Pre-Closing TAP Matter that is not
a Category 1 Matter.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Class&nbsp;A Interest</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in
the VEP LLC Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Class&nbsp;A Member</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the
VEP LLC Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Class&nbsp;B Interest</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in
the VEP LLC Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Class&nbsp;B Member</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the
VEP LLC Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Class&nbsp;C Interest</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in
the VEP LLC Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Class&nbsp;C Member</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the
VEP LLC Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Closing Knowledge</u>&#148; means, with respect to the matter in
question, the actual knowledge of and what should have been known upon
reasonable investigation, by those persons listed on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;VI-D</u>.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-5</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Closing Representations</u>&#148; means all of the representations and
warranties in <b>Article&nbsp;4</b>, excluding
for purposes of <b>Section&nbsp;10.16</b>
only the Signing Representations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Code</u>&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, and
all final, temporary and proposed Treasury Regulations promulgated thereunder
(the &#147;<u>Treasury Regulations</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Combination Product</u>&#148; means any Pharmaceutical Product
containing Prevacid, Ilaprazole, TAK</font><font face="Times New Roman">-</font>390
MR or Uloric in combination with one or more biologically active ingredients
other than Prevacid, Ilaprazole, TAK-390 MR and Uloric.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Commercially Reasonable Efforts</u>&#148; means (exclusively for
purposes of Section&nbsp;14.02) efforts and resources commonly used in the U.S.
pharmaceutical industry for an internally developed product of similar
commercial potential, at a similar stage in its lifecycle taking into
consideration its safety and efficacy, its cost to develop, sell and market,
the competitiveness of alternative products, its proprietary position and the
likelihood of Governmental Authorization, and any other product opportunities,
all being consistent with prudent scientific and business judgment, taking into
account the particular circumstances of such Party, and none of which shall be
influenced by capital contributions that the Class&nbsp;B Member could be
required to make to VEP LLC under Section&nbsp;3.4(b)(ii)-(iv)&nbsp;of the VEP
LLC Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Confidential Information</u>&#148; means the Newco Confidential
Information and the TAP Confidential Information.&#160; Confidential Information shall also mean
Personally Identifiable Information.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Consequential Damages</u>&#148; means any consequential damages, special
damages, lost profits or diminution in value, except that with respect to
special damages and diminution in value, only to the extent such special
damages or diminution in value is best characterized as consequential damages
as opposed to direct damages.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Contemplated Transactions</u>&#148; means the transactions contemplated
by this Agreement and the other Transaction Documents (including the Internal
Restructuring and the Exchange).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Contracts</u>&#148; means all contracts, agreements, leases, licenses,
commitments, obligations, promises, undertakings, sales and purchase orders and
internal work orders, whether written or oral, and whether express or implied,
that are legally binding.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Contribution and Distribution Agreement</u>&#148;
means the Contribution and Distribution Agreement, dated as of the Closing
Date, by and among TAP, the TAP Sales Subsidiary, Newco and Newco Lupron Sales
Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Contribution, Conveyance and Assumption
Agreement</u>&#148; means the Contribution, Conveyance and Assumption Agreement,
dated as of the Closing Date, by and between TAP and Newco.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Damages</u>&#148; means all losses, damages (including direct damages,
compensatory damages, special damages and consequential damages), Liabilities,
obligations, penalties, </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-6</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">assessments, dues, fines,
amounts paid in settlement, judgments, indemnification payments, lost profits,
diminution of value, costs and expenses (including reasonable attorneys&#146; and
consultants&#146; fees and expenses), costs related to the investigation,
remediation or monitoring of the environment, of any nature whatsoever,
including any of the foregoing or portion thereof that may be incurred or
relate to periods after the Closing.&#160; All
Damages shall be calculated on a pre-Tax basis, without reduction or other
adjustment for any Tax consequences arising out of the payment of such Damages,
and Damages shall not include (a)&nbsp;any internal costs or expenses of any
Party or its Affiliates or (b)&nbsp;any<b>  </b>Capital
Contribution to VEP LLC by any Member pursuant to the VEP LLC Operating
Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Debarred Entity</u>&#148; means a corporation, partnership or
association that has been debarred by the FDA pursuant to Title 21 of the
United States Code Section&nbsp;335a(a)&nbsp;or (b)&nbsp;from submitting or
assisting in the submission of any abbreviated drug application, or a
Subsidiary or Affiliate of a Debarred Entity.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Debarred Individual</u>&#148; means an individual who has been debarred
by the FDA pursuant to Title 21 of the United States Code Section&nbsp;335a(a)&nbsp;or
(b)&nbsp;from providing services in any capacity to a Person that has an
approved or pending drug product application.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Disputed Amount</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the VEP
LLC Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Disputed Third Party Royalty Obligation</u>&#148; has the meaning given to
such term in the VEP LLC Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Employee Pension Benefit Plan</u>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;3(2)&nbsp;of
ERISA.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Employee Welfare Benefit Plan</u>&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;3(1)&nbsp;of
ERISA.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Environmental Laws</u>&#148; means any federal, state or local Law
relating to public health or safety, worker health or safety, or pollution,
damage to or protection of the environment and natural resources, including
Laws relating to emissions, discharges, releases or threatened release of Hazardous
Substances into the environment (including ambient air, surface water,
groundwater, land surface or subsurface), or otherwise relating to the
manufacture, processing, distribution, use, treatment, storage, generation,
disposal, transport or handling of any Hazardous Substances.&#160; Without limiting the generality of the
foregoing, the term encompasses each of the following statutes and the
regulations promulgated thereunder, and any similar applicable state or local Law,
each as amended: (a)&nbsp;the Comprehensive Environmental Response,
Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980; (b)&nbsp;the Solid Waste Disposal Act;
(c)&nbsp;the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act; (d)&nbsp;the Toxic
Substance Control Act; (e)&nbsp;the Clean Water Act; (f)&nbsp;the Clean Air
Act; (g)&nbsp;the Safe Drinking Water Act; (h)&nbsp;the National Environmental
Policy Act of 1969; (i)&nbsp;the Superfund Amendments and Reauthorization Act
of 1986; (j)&nbsp;Title&nbsp;III of the Superfund Amendments and
Reauthorization Act; (k)&nbsp;the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide and
Rodenticide Act; and (l)&nbsp;the provisions of the Occupational Safety and
Health Act of 1970 relating to the handling of and exposure to Hazardous
Substances and similar substances.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-7</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>ERISA</u>&#148; means the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of
1974, as amended, and the regulations thereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Estimated Net Assets Differential</u>&#148; means an amount equal to
(i)&nbsp;half of the Estimated TAP Net Assets minus (ii)&nbsp;the Estimated
Split-off Business Net Assets.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Estimated Net Asset Equalization Amount</u>&#148; means an amount equal
to the Estimated Net Assets Differential; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, if
the Estimated Net Assets Differential is less than zero, then (i)&nbsp;TAP
shall retain, as a Retained Asset, an amount of Split-off Accounts Receivable
equal to, or as near to equal as practicable to, (x)&nbsp;the absolute value of
the Estimated Net Assets Differential multiplied by (y)&nbsp;the Accounts
Receivable Reserve Factor and (ii)&nbsp;the Estimated Net Asset Equalization
Amount shall be zero.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Estimated Split-off Business Net Assets</u>&#148; means the Net Assets
of Newco and its Subsidiary as if the Contribution and Assumption (excluding
the ownership interest in the Headquarters Facility and the related Assumed
Liabilities) had occurred on December&nbsp;31, 2007, which shall be derived
from the TAP 2007 Audited Balance Sheet with the calculation thereof to be
prepared by the controller of TAP and reviewed by Abbott and TAH.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Estimated TAP Net Assets</u>&#148; means the Net Assets of TAP and the TAP
Subsidiaries (consolidated) as of December&nbsp;31, 2007 based on the TAP 2007
Audited Balance Sheet with the calculation thereof to be prepared by the
controller of TAP and reviewed by a Representative of Abbott and TAH.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Excluded Individual</u>&#148; or &#147;<u>Excluded Entity</u>&#148; means
(i)&nbsp;an individual or entity, as applicable, who has been excluded,
debarred, suspended or is otherwise ineligible to participate in federal health
care programs such as Medicare or Medicaid by the Office of the Inspector
General (OIG/HHS) of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, or
(ii)&nbsp;an individual or entity, as applicable, who has been excluded,
debarred, suspended or is otherwise ineligible to participate in federal
procurement and non-procurement programs, including those produced by the U.S.
General Services Administration.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Existing Lupron License Agreement</u>&#148; means the Leuprolide
Sustained Release Formulation License Agreement dated March&nbsp;6, 1989, as
amended prior to the Closing, by and between Takeda and TAP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Existing Lupron Supply Agreement</u>&#148; means the Supply Agreement on
Leuprolide Sustained Release Formulation dated October&nbsp;20, 1989, as
amended prior to the Closing, by and between Takeda and TAP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>FDA</u>&#148; means the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, or any
successor thereto or to its responsibilities with respect to Pharmaceutical
Products.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Federal Funds Rate</u>&#148; means, for a particular day, the offered
rate as reported in <i>The Wall Street Journal</i>
published for such day in the &#147;Money Rates&#148; section for reserves traded among
commercial banks for overnight use in amounts of one million dollars or more
or, if no such rate is published for a day, such rate as most-recently
published in <i>The Wall Street Journal</i>,
calculated on a daily basis based on a 365-day year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-8</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>GAAP</u>&#148; means U.S. generally accepted accounting principles as of
the date hereof, applied on a basis consistent with prior accounting periods.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Governmental Authority</u>&#148; means any U.S. or non-U.S., federal,
territorial, state or local governmental authority, quasi-governmental
authority, instrumentality, court, government or self-regulatory organization,
commission, tribunal or organization or any regulatory, administrative or other
agency, or any political or other subdivision, department or branch of any of
the foregoing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Governmental Authorization</u>&#148; shall mean any license, franchise,
permit, permission, variance, clearance, registration, qualification or other
similar authorization or approval issued, granted, given or otherwise made
available by or under the authority of any Governmental Authority or pursuant
to any Applicable Law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Hazardous Substance</u>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;any &#147;hazardous substance&#148;
as now defined pursuant to the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation
and Liability Act, 42 U.S.C. &#167;9601(14); (ii)&nbsp;any &#147;pollutant or
contaminant&#148; as defined in 42 U.S.C. &#167;9601(33); (iii)&nbsp;any material defined
as &#147;hazardous waste&#148; pursuant to 40 C.F.R. Part&nbsp;261; (iv)&nbsp;any
petroleum, including crude oil and any fraction thereof; (v)&nbsp;natural
synthetic gas usable for fuel; (vi)&nbsp;any &#147;hazardous chemical&#148; as defined
pursuant to 29 C.F.R. Part&nbsp;1910; (vii)&nbsp;any asbestos, polychlorinated
biphenyl, radium, or isomer of dioxin, or any material or thing containing or
composed of such substance or substances; and (viii)&nbsp;any other pollutant,
waste, residue, contaminant or similar material which is hazardous, toxic,
poisonous, or otherwise presents a threat to human health or the environment.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Headquarters Facility</u>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;the building (excluding
all removable fixtures thereof, but including facility equipment and land and
improvements thereon) located at 675 North Field Drive, Lake Forest, Illinois,
United States, consisting of approximately 272,943 square feet and (b)&nbsp;the
approximately 45.33 acres of surrounding land on which the building is located
as more particularly described on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;V</u>, together with all
improvements located thereon and all easements, rights, privileges, remainders,
reversions and appurtenances thereunto belonging or in any way appertaining,
and all of the estate, rights, title, interest or claim whatsoever of TAP
therein, in the street and ways adjacent thereto, at law or in equity, in possession
or expectancy, now or hereafter acquired (with the exception of the
Headquarters Lease).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Headquarters Lease</u>&#148; means the Office
Lease, made as of the Closing Date, by and between Newco and TAP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Identifiable Intellectual Property</u>&#148; means patents, patent
applications, patent disclosures, registered trademarks and service marks
(including logos and trade dress), applications for trademark and service mark
registrations, trade names, domain names, registered copyrights, applications
for copyrights, registered mask works and applications for masks works
registrations.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Ilaprazole</u>&#148; has the meaning specified within the definition of
Ilaprazole Products.</font></p>
