<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Ilaprazole Products</u>&#148; means all Pharmaceutical Products
containing (i)&nbsp;any compound to which TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries is
licensed or otherwise granted rights or permission under and pursuant to that
certain License Agreement by and between Takeda Chemical Industries, Ltd. and
TAP dated February&nbsp;17, 2004, as amended, immediately prior to the Closing,
if a Pharmaceutical Product containing such compound is launched for commercial
sale in the United States after a Pharmaceutical Product containing<b>  </b>any compound to which TAP or any of the
TAP Subsidiaries is licensed or otherwise granted rights or permission under
and pursuant to that certain License Agreement by and between Ilyang
Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd. and TAP dated September&nbsp;7, 2005, as amended,
immediately prior to the Closing; or (ii)&nbsp;any compound to which TAP or any
of the TAP Subsidiaries is licensed or otherwise granted rights or permission
under and pursuant to that certain License Agreement by and between Ilyang
Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd. and TAP dated September&nbsp;7, 2005, as amended,
immediately prior to the Closing, if a Pharmaceutical Product containing any
such compound is launched for commercial sale in the United States after a
Pharmaceutical Product containing<b>  </b>any
compound to which TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries is licensed or otherwise
granted rights or permission under and pursuant to that certain License Agreement
by and between Takeda Chemical Industries, Ltd. and TAP dated February&nbsp;17,
2004, as amended, immediately prior to the Closing (the compound contained in
such Ilaprazole Products, &#147;<u>Ilaprazole</u>&#148;); <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>,
that for purposes of Section&nbsp;3.4(b)(ii)-(iv), Section&nbsp;4.4(b)(iv)&nbsp;and
Section&nbsp;9.3(a)-(b)&nbsp;of the VEP LLC Operating Agreement, Ilaprazole
Products mean all Pharmaceutical Products containing<b>  </b>any compound to which TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries is
licensed or otherwise granted rights or permission under and pursuant to that
certain License Agreement by and between Ilyang Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd. and TAP
dated September&nbsp;7, 2005, as amended, immediately prior to the Closing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Ilaprazole Profits</u>&#148; means an amount equal to the &#147;After-Tax
Income&#148; specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for all of the Ilaprazole Products
for the period from the Closing Date until the applicable Cap Reference Date,
determined on a pro rata basis for any partial year or other period (the &#147;<u>Assumed
Ilaprazole Profit Amount</u>&#148;); <u>provided</u> that such amount shall be (x)&nbsp;increased
if actual Net Sales of all Ilaprazole Products in the respective period are
greater than Net Sales as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for such period
and (y)&nbsp;decreased if actual Net Sales of all Ilaprazole Products in the respective
period are less than Net Sales as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for such
period, in each case based on the product of (i)&nbsp;the Assumed Ilaprazole
Profit Amount multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;a percentage equal to such actual Net
Sales divided by such Net Sales amount specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>; <u>provided</u>,
<u>however</u>, that with respect to any period after 2016, Ilaprazole Profits
means (i)&nbsp;the actual amount of Net Sales for all Ilaprazole Products
during such period multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;the forecasted profit margin for all
Ilaprazole Products for the year 2016 as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>IND</u>&#148; means all Investigational New Drug Applications, including
any amendments or supplements thereto, submitted to FDA under Section&nbsp;505(i)&nbsp;of
the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Indebtedness</u>&#148; means, without duplication, (i)&nbsp;the
principal of and interest accrued on (A)&nbsp;indebtedness for money borrowed
and (B)&nbsp;indebtedness evidenced by notes, debentures, bonds or other
similar instruments; (ii)&nbsp;all obligations issued or assumed as the
deferred purchase price of property (but excluding accounts payable arising in
the ordinary </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

obligations for the reimbursement of any obligor on any letter of credit or

the Party from whom indemnification is sought.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Intellectual Property</u>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;all inventions (whether
patentable or unpatentable and whether or not reduced to practice), all patent
disclosures, industrial designs, utility models and all patents and patent
applications, together with all reissuances, continuations,
continuations-in-part, divisions, revisions, extensions, renewals and
reexaminations thereof, and applications therefor (b)&nbsp;all trademarks,
service marks, trade dress, domain names, web site addresses, logos, trade
names, and corporate names, together with all translations, adaptations,
derivations, and combinations thereof and including all goodwill associated
therewith, and all applications, registrations, and renewals in connection
therewith, (c)&nbsp;all registered and unregistered copyrights, all rights to
database information, and all applications, registrations, and renewals in
connection therewith, (d)&nbsp;all mask works and all applications,
registrations, and renewals in connection therewith, (e)&nbsp;all trade secrets
and confidential business information (including research and development,
know-how, formulas, compositions, manufacturing and production processes and
techniques, technical data, software, databases, designs, drawings,
specifications, customer and supplier lists, pricing and cost information, and
business and marketing plans and proposals), (f)&nbsp;all rights, including
rights of privacy and publicity, to use the names, likenesses and other
personal characteristics of any individual, (g)&nbsp;other proprietary rights,
and (h)&nbsp;all rights and remedies against past, present and future
infringement, misappropriation or other violation of the foregoing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Interchangeable Assets</u>&#148; means all servers and other computer
hardware not related primarily to the Split-off Business or included in subsection
(h)&nbsp;of the definition of Retained Assets.</font></p>

by TAP and the contribution of capital to Newco by TAP in exchange for Newco

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Liabilities</u>&#148; means any and all debts, liabilities and
obligations, whether accrued or fixed, absolute or contingent, matured or
unmatured, known or unknown, due or to become due, liquidated or unliquidated,
or determined or determinable (including those arising under any Applicable
Law, Legal Proceeding or Contract), and whether or not the same would be
required by GAAP to be stated in financial statements or disclosed in the notes
thereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Lien</u>&#148; means, with respect to any property or asset, any
mortgage, lien, pledge, charge, security interest or encumbrance of any kind in
respect of such property or asset.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Lupron</u>&#148; has the meaning specified within the definition of
Lupron Products.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Lupron Employee</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the
Amended and Restated Employee Matters Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Lupron License and Supply Agreement</u>&#148;
means the Lupron License and Supply Agreement, dated as of the Closing Date, by
and between Takeda and Newco.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Lupron Net Sales</u>&#148; means, for any period, actual net sales of
Lupron Products for such period measured in a manner consistent with the
definition of net sales of Lupron Products used as the basis for the projected
net sales of Lupron Products set forth in <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Lupron Products</u>&#148; means all Pharmaceutical Products containing
leuprolide or leuprolide acetate (&#147;<u>Lupron</u>&#148;) and to which TAP or any of
the TAP Subsidiaries is licensed or otherwise granted rights or permission
immediately prior to Closing or to which Newco is licensed or otherwise granted
rights or permission as of the Closing under and pursuant to the Lupron License
and Supply Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Lupron Profits</u>&#148; means an amount equal to the &#147;After-Tax Income&#148;
specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for all of the Lupron Products for the
period from the Closing Date until the applicable Cap Reference Date,
determined on a pro rata basis for any partial year or other period (the &#147;<u>Assumed
Lupron Profit Amount</u>&#148;); <u>provided</u> that such amount shall be (x)&nbsp;increased
if Lupron Net Sales in the respective period are greater than net sales as
specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> with respect to Lupron Products for such
period and (y)&nbsp;decreased if Lupron Net Sales in the respective period are
less than net sales as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> with respect to
Lupron Products for such period, in each case based on the product of (i)&nbsp;the
Assumed Lupron Profit Amount multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;a percentage equal to such
Lupron Net Sales divided by such net sales amount specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>;
<u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that with respect to any period after 2016,
Lupron Profits means (i)&nbsp;Lupron Net Sales during such period multiplied by
(ii)&nbsp;the forecasted profit margin for the Lupron Products for the year
2016 as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Marketing and Distribution Agreement
(Canada)</u>&#148; means the TAP &#150; Abbott-Canada Lupron Marketing and Distribution Agreement,
dated as of the Closing Date, between TAP and Abbott-Canada.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Marketing and Distribution Agreement
(Puerto Rico)</u>&#148; means the TAP &#150; Abbott-Puerto Rico Lupron Marketing and
Distribution Agreement, dated as of the Closing Date, between TAP and Abbott-Puerto
Rico.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-13</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Master Services and Supply Agreement</u>&#148;
means the Master Services and Supply Agreement, dated as of the Closing Date,
between VEP LLC and TAP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Member</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the VEP LLC
Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Mixed Contract</u>&#148; means any TAP Contract that inures to the
benefit or burden of each of the Retained Business and the Split-off Business.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>NDAs</u>&#148; means all New Drug Applications, including any amendments
or supplements thereto, submitted to FDA under Section&nbsp;505 of the Federal
Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Net Assets</u>&#148; means an amount equal to (i)&nbsp;total assets
minus (ii)&nbsp;total liabilities, both on a book value basis and calculated in
accordance with GAAP applied on a basis consistent with the TAP 2007 Audited
Balance Sheet and the Agreed Accounting Conventions.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Net Assets Differential</u>&#148; means an amount equal to (i)&nbsp;half
of the TAP Closing Net Assets (ii)&nbsp;minus the Split-off Business Closing
Net Assets.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Net Sales</u>&#148; means, with respect to
each of the Prevacid Products, TAK-390 MR Products, Ilaprazole Products and
Uloric Products, for any period, the gross invoiced sales of such product in
the respective Territory by VEP LLC and its Affiliates and TAP and its
Affiliates and their respective licensees and successors of any of the
foregoing for such period, calculated in each case in accordance with GAAP,
less (without duplication) the following items with respect to such product to
the extent included in the calculation of such gross invoiced sales:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>discounts, credits,
rebates, allowances, adjustments, rejections, recalls, and returns to drug
wholesalers or their customers, and, in the case of sales to drug wholesalers
where there are no direct shipments to such customers, chargebacks;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>price reductions,
whether retroactive or otherwise imposed by Governmental Authorities;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>sales, excise,
turnover, inventory, value added and other Taxes incurred or assessed on the
sales of such product; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>management fees incurred
during the VEP Period to group purchasing organizations to the extent relating
to such products and included in rebates;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">provided</font></u>, <u>however</u>, that Net Sales shall
not include (x)&nbsp;sales to a Person to the extent sales by such Person are
included in Net Sales, (y)&nbsp;any over-the-counter sales of Products (as
defined in the Novartis License Agreement) by Novartis AG (or its successors or
licensees) in the United States including its territories and possessions or
any amounts paid to TAP by Novartis AG (or its successors) pursuant to the
Novartis License Agreement and (z)&nbsp;any co-promotion arrangement between or
among TAP and/or any of its Subsidiaries and/or their respective Affiliates; <u>provided</u>
<u>further</u> that, with respect to any Combination Product, Net Sales means
the amount determined as described above, multiplied by a fraction, the
numerator of which is the </p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-14</font></p>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">cost of Prevacid, Ilaprazole, TAK-390 MR or Uloric, as the case may be,
as sold alone in finished dosage form and the denominator of which is the total
cost of all the therapeutically active ingredients in such Combination Product
(including Prevacid, Ilaprazole, TAK-390 MR or Uloric, as the case may be),
with the cost in each case to be determined by the standard cost formula of TAP
or VEP LLC, as applicable.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Newco Confidential Information</u>&#148; means all documents and other
confidential or proprietary information (including information relating to
trade secrets, processes, unpublished patent and trademark applications and
product development), all inventions (whether patentable or unpatentable and
whether or not reduced to practice), all improvements thereto, all patent
disclosures, industrial designs, research and development, know-how, formulas,
compositions, manufacturing and production processes and techniques, technical
data, software, databases, designs, drawings, specifications, customer and
supplier lists, pricing and cost information, and business and marketing plans
and proposals, concerning<b>  </b>the
Split-off Business and Newco.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Newco Indemnified Parties</u>&#148; means Newco, its Affiliates and each
of their respective Representatives.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Newco Stock</u>&#148; means all of the issued and outstanding common
stock, par value $0.01 per share, of Newco.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Novartis License Agreement</u>&#148; means the License Agreement, dated December&nbsp;19,
2005, by and between TAP Pharmaceutical Products Inc. and Novartis AG, as in
effect on the date of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Occurrence</u>&#148; has the meaning assigned to such term within the
definition of Split-off Business Material Adverse Effect.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Order</u>&#148; means any award, decision, writ, decree, injunction,
judgment, order, ruling, or verdict entered, issued, made or rendered by any
court, administrative agency or other Governmental Authority, or by any
arbitrator.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Party</u>&#148; means, individually, each of Takeda, TAH, Abbott, TAP,
VEP LLC and Newco.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Permitted Liens</u>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;Liens for Taxes, assessments
and government charges or levies not yet due and payable or being contested in
good faith and (ii)&nbsp;such other Liens as would not have a TAP Material
Adverse Effect or a Split-off Business Material Adverse Effect.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Person</u>&#148; means an individual, corporation, partnership, limited
liability company, association, trust or other entity or organization, including
a Governmental Authority.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Personally Identifiable Information</u>&#148; means any single element,
or combination of elements, of non-public information related to an individual
where that information either directly or indirectly identifies that
individual.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Pharmaceutical Products</u>&#148; means therapeutic drug products for
human use or for such other uses, if any, to which TAP has rights immediately
prior to the Closing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Plea and Related Agreements</u>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;the Side Letter
Agreement, dated September&nbsp;28, 2001, between the United States of America
and Abbott, (ii)&nbsp;the Side Letter Agreement, dated September&nbsp;28, 2001,
between the United States of America and Takeda, (iii)&nbsp;the Plea Agreement,
dated September&nbsp;28, 2001, between TAP and the United States of America, (iv)&nbsp;the
Settlement Agreement and Release, entered into as of September&nbsp;28, 2001,
between TAP, the United States of America and Douglas N. Durand, Joseph
Gerstein, M.D. and Tufts Associated Health Maintenance Organization, (v)&nbsp;the
Corporate Integrity Agreement, dated September&nbsp;28, 2001, between the
Office of the Inspector General of the Department of Health and Human Services
and TAP, (vi)&nbsp;the judgment entered against TAP on December&nbsp;6, 2001
pursuant to the Plea Agreement, (vii)&nbsp;any and all settlement agreements
between TAP and any of the individual States of the United States and (viii)&nbsp;any
other related agreement of TAP.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Pre-Closing TAP Matters</u>&#148; means any fact, event, development or
circumstance prior to the Closing with respect to the Retained Business, the
Retained Employees, the Split-off Business, the Lupron Employees and/or any
other business or operation of TAP, including Assumed Liabilities and Retained
Liabilities as of the Closing.&#160; All
matters arising out of a breach of the Special Warranty Deed and all Legal
Proceedings outstanding on or prior to the Closing Date (excluding (i)&nbsp;Takeda
Pharmaceutical Company Ltd. and TAP Pharmaceutical Products Inc. v. Teva
Pharmaceutical USA,&nbsp;Inc. and Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd. and (ii)&nbsp;Takeda
Pharmaceutical Company Ltd., TAP Pharmaceutical Products Inc. and Ethypharm,
S.A. v. Teva Pharmaceutical USA,&nbsp;Inc. and Teva Pharmaceutical Industries
Ltd.) shall constitute Pre-Closing TAP Matters.&#160;
The disclosure of any exception to the representations and warranties
contained in <b>Article&nbsp;4</b> or
other matter on the TAP Disclosure Schedules shall not eliminate or limit in
any way the indemnification rights of any Party pursuant to <b>Article&nbsp;12</b> with respect to such
exception or matter.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Premises</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the Special
Warranty Deed.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Prevacid</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the definition
of Prevacid Products.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Prevacid Competing Product</u>&#148; means any product (other than
Prevacid Products, TAK-390 MR Products or Ilaprazole Products) that is
categorized as a proton pump inhibitor product.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Prevacid Products</u>&#148; means all Pharmaceutical Products containing
lansoprazole (&#147;<u>Prevacid</u>&#148;) and to which TAP or any of the TAP
Subsidiaries is licensed or otherwise granted rights or permission immediately
prior to Closing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Prevacid Profits</u>&#148; means an amount equal to the &#147;After-Tax
Income&#148; specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for all of the Prevacid Products
for the period from the Closing Date until the applicable Cap Reference Date,
determined on a pro rata basis for any partial year or other period (the &#147;<u>Assumed
Prevacid Profit Amount</u>&#148;); <u>provided</u> that such amount shall be (x)&nbsp;increased
if actual Net Sales of all Prevacid Products in the respective period are
greater than Net </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-16</font></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-16',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2907448\11202-1-kc-19.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='Apr 30 17:59 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Sales as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for such period and (y)&nbsp;decreased
if actual Net Sales of all Prevacid Products in the respective period are less
than Net Sales as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for such period, in each
case based on the product of (i)&nbsp;the Assumed Prevacid Profit Amount
multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;a percentage equal to such actual Net Sales divided by
such Net Sales amount specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>,
that with respect to any period after 2016, Prevacid Profits means (i)&nbsp;the
actual amount of Net Sales for all Prevacid Products during such period
multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;the forecasted profit margin for all Prevacid Products
for the year 2016 as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in .2in .0001pt 0in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Private Letter Ruling</u>&#148; means the
private letter ruling issued by the IRS to TAP on March&nbsp;21, 2008 (PLR
151750-07).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Prohibited Transactions</u>&#148; means a &#147;prohibited transaction&#148; as
defined in Section&nbsp;4975(c)&nbsp;of the Code and Section&nbsp;406 of ERISA.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Representatives</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Person, the
officers, directors, employees, accountants, counsel, consultants, advisors and
agents of such Person.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Retained Assets</u>&#148; means all Assets of TAP other than the
Transferred Assets, which Retained Assets shall include:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all cash,
cash equivalents and bank deposits, other than any Estimated Net Asset
Equalization Amount and any amount payable by TAP pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;3.03(c)(ii)</b>;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
accounts and notes receivable, certificates of deposit, shares of stock,
securities, bonds, debentures, evidences of Indebtedness and any other debt,
equity or other interests in or of any Person, other than accounts and notes
receivable related exclusively to the Split-off Products; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>,
that if the Estimated Net Assets Differential is a negative number, then the
Retained Assets shall include an amount of Split-off Accounts Receivable equal
to, or as near to equal as practicable to, (x)&nbsp;the absolute value of the
Estimated Net Assets Differential multiplied by (y)&nbsp;the Accounts
Receivable Reserve Factor;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
refunds or credits related to any Company Shared Tax (generally as defined in
the Amended and Restated Tax Agreement, but specifically including the items
excepted from such definition);</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
insurance policies and proceeds received after the Closing Date under any
insurance policy maintained by TAP and all rights thereunder;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all books
and records (i)&nbsp;that are excepted from clause (m)&nbsp;of the definition
of Transferred Assets or (ii)&nbsp;that TAP is required by Law to retain; <u>provided</u>
that TAP shall at and, subject to the document retention policy of TAP as in
effect immediately prior to the Closing Date, subsequent to the Contribution
Effective Time furnish Abbott and Newco with access to and complete copies of any
and all of the foregoing relating to the Transferred Assets or the Split-off
Business as reasonably requested by Newco or Abbott from time to time prior to
the two year anniversary of the Closing Date;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-17</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all

Retained Assets;</p>

Contracts;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all

qualifications of TAP to conduct business as a foreign corporation;</p>

foreign currency Contracts;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(k)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the ISDA

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(l)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all

TAP Subsidiaries relating primarily to the Retained Business, Prevacid or the

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(m)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in this Agreement,
Assets owned and used by Abbott or any of its Affiliates in the performance of
the Transition Services Agreement do not constitute Retained Assets.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Retained Business</u>&#148; means all of the business and activities of
TAP and its Subsidiaries other than the Split-off Business.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Retained Business Closing Balance Sheet</u>&#148; means the audited<b>  </b>consolidated balance sheet for TAP and its
Subsidiaries, excluding Newco and its Subsidiary,<b>  </b>as of the Closing Date, giving effect to the Contribution and
Assumption but not the Exchange.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Retained Employee</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the
Amended and Restated Employee Matters Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Retained Liabilities</u>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;all Liabilities relating
to the ISDA Incentive Stock Option Hedge under the TAP ISDA Master Agreement
dated as of September&nbsp;29, 2000 and (ii)&nbsp;all other Liabilities other
than Assumed Liabilities.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Reversion Event</u>&#148; means any termination of a subject license or
any reversion of a subject license to the licensor (i)&nbsp;in accordance with
the provisions of such subject license in effect on the date hereof, (ii)&nbsp;pursuant
to mutual agreement between licensor and licensee, without compensation to the
licensee except in accordance with the provisions of such subject license as in
effect on the date hereof, or (iii)&nbsp;pursuant to unilateral relinquishment
by the </font></p>

question, the actual knowledge of those persons listed on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;VI-E</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

receivable from third parties arising from the sale of the Split-off Products
in existence at the Contribution Effective Time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Split-off Business</u>&#148; means all TAP activities related to the
Split-off Products.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Split-off Business Category 1 Cap</u>&#148;
means an amount equal to $2,095,000,000 less (i)&nbsp;the excess of (x)&nbsp;the
Lupron Profits over (y)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of all capital contributions
made by the Class&nbsp;B Member to VEP LLC pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.4(b)(ii)-(iv)&nbsp;of
the VEP LLC Operating Agreement, in each case from the Closing Date to the
applicable Cap Reference Date, and (ii)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of all
distributions to the Class&nbsp;B Member pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.4(b)(i)-(iv)&nbsp;of
the VEP LLC Operating Agreement (including any distributions deemed paid
pursuant to <b>Section&nbsp;3.04(a)</b>)
from the Closing Date to the applicable Cap Reference Date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Split-off Business Closing Balance Sheet</u>&#148; means the audited
consolidated balance sheet for Newco and its Subsidiary<b>  </b>as of the Closing Date, giving effect to
the Contribution and Assumption but not the Exchange.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Split-off Business Closing Net Assets</u>&#148; means the Net Assets of
Newco and its Subsidiary<b>  </b>(excluding
the ownership interest in the Headquarters Facility and the related Assumed
Liabilities) as set forth on the Split-off Business Closing Balance Sheet.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Split-off Business Material Adverse Effect</u>&#148; means any fact,
event, change, development or effect, including initial notice or discovery
thereof (each, an &#147;<u>Occurrence</u>&#148;), that, individually or when taken
together with any other Occurrence, is materially adverse or is </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-19</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-19',FILE='C:\JMS\Ralex\08-11202-1\task2907915\11202-1-kc-21.htm',USER='Ralexc',CD='Apr 30 19:10 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">reasonably expected to be materially adverse to the business,
operations, results of operations, condition (financial or otherwise), Assets
or Liabilities of the Split-off Business taken as a whole; <u>provided</u> that
the following shall be excluded from the definition of Split-off Business
Material Adverse Effect and from the determination of whether a Split-off
Business Material Adverse Effect has occurred: (i)&nbsp;any Occurrence
generally applicable to the industries and markets in which the Split-off
Business is involved; (ii)&nbsp;any Occurrence generally applicable to the
United States or global economic conditions; (iii)&nbsp;any Occurrence arising
in connection with earthquakes, hostilities, acts of war, sabotage or terrorism
or military actions or any escalation or material worsening of any such
hostilities, acts of war, sabotage or terrorism or military actions existing or
underway as of the date hereof or (iv)&nbsp;any Occurrence directly caused by
the execution of the Transaction Documents or the public announcement of the
Contemplated Transactions,<b>  </b>except
to the extent, in the case of clause (i), (ii)&nbsp;or (iii)&nbsp;above, that
such Occurrence results in a disproportionate impact on the Split-off
Business.&#160; For purposes of <b>Sections 11.02(e)&nbsp;</b>and <b>11.03(f)</b>, &#147;Split-off Business Material
Adverse Effect&#148; shall include any Occurrence that would have a material adverse
effect on the likelihood that the Contemplated Transactions will qualify as a
reorganization under Sections 368(a)(1)(D)&nbsp;and 355 of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Split-off Intellectual Property</u>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;the
Identifiable Intellectual Property set forth in <u>Schedule 4.15(a)(i)&nbsp;</u>of
the TAP Disclosure Schedules and (ii)&nbsp;all Intellectual Property (other
than Identifiable Intellectual Property) in and to which TAP or any of the TAP
Subsidiaries holds, or has a right to hold, any right, title or interest and
that is used primarily or held for use primarily in, that is developed
primarily for, or that relates primarily to the Split-off Business or Split-off
Products.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Split-off Products</u>&#148; means the Lupron Products, Asoprisnil
Products and SARM Products.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Subsidiary</u>&#148; of Takeda, Abbott, TAH, TAP or any other Person
means any corporation, partnership or other legal entity of which Takeda,
Abbott, TAH, TAP or such other Person, as the case may be (either alone or
through or together with any other Subsidiary), owns, directly or indirectly,
more than fifty percent (50%) of the stock or other equity interests the holder
of which is generally entitled to vote for the election of the board of
directors or other governing body of such corporation, partnership or other
legal entity.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Supply Agreement</u>&#148; means the Supply
Agreement, dated as of the Closing Date, between VEP LLC and the TAP Sales
Subsidiary.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAH Indemnified Parties</u>&#148; means TAH and Takeda, their Affiliates
and each of their respective Representatives.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAK-390 MR</u>&#148; has the meaning specified within the definition of
TAK-390 MR Products.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAK-390 MR Products</u>&#148; means all Pharmaceutical Products
containing (i)&nbsp;any compound to which TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries is
licensed, or otherwise granted rights or permission under and pursuant to that
certain License Agreement by and between Takeda Chemical Industries, Ltd. and
TAP dated February&nbsp;17, 2004, as amended, immediately prior to </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-20</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the Closing, if a Pharmaceutical Product containing such compound is
launched for commercial sale in the United States prior to a Pharmaceutical
Product containing any compound to which TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries is
licensed or otherwise granted rights or permission under and pursuant to that
certain License Agreement by and between Ilyang Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd. and TAP
dated September&nbsp;7, 2005, as amended, immediately prior to the Closing; or (ii)&nbsp;any
compound to which TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries is licensed or otherwise
granted rights or permission under and pursuant to that certain License
Agreement by and between Ilyang Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd. and TAP dated September&nbsp;7,
2005, as amended, immediately prior to the Closing, if a Pharmaceutical Product
containing any such compound<b>  </b>is
launched for commercial sale in the United States prior to a Pharmaceutical
Product containing<b>  </b>any compound to
which TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries is licensed or otherwise granted
rights or permission under and pursuant to that certain License Agreement by
and between Takeda Chemical Industries, Ltd. and TAP dated February&nbsp;17,
2004, as amended, immediately prior to the Closing (the compound contained in
such TAK-390 MR Products, &#147;<u>TAK-390 MR</u>&#148;); <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>,
that for purposes of Section&nbsp;3.4(b)(ii)-(iv), Section&nbsp;4.4(b)(iv)&nbsp;and
Section&nbsp;9.3(a)-(b)&nbsp;of the VEP LLC Operating Agreement, TAK-390 MR
Products means all Pharmaceutical Products containing<b>  </b>any compound to which TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries is
licensed or otherwise granted rights or permission under and pursuant to that
certain License Agreement by and between Takeda Chemical Industries, Ltd. and
TAP dated February&nbsp;17, 2004, as amended, immediately prior to the Closing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAK-390 MR Profits</u>&#148; means an amount equal to the &#147;After-Tax
Income&#148; specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for all of the TAK-390 MR Products
for the period from the Closing Date until the applicable Cap Reference Date,
determined on a pro rata basis for any partial year or other period (the &#147;<u>Assumed
TAK-390 MR Profit Amount</u>&#148;); <u>provided</u> that such amount shall be (x)&nbsp;increased
if actual Net Sales of all TAK-390 MR Products in the respective period are
greater than Net Sales as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for such period
and (y)&nbsp;decreased if actual Net Sales of all TAK-390 MR Products in the
respective period are less than Net Sales as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>
for such period, in each case based on the product of (i)&nbsp;the Assumed
TAK-390 MR Profit Amount multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;a percentage equal to such
actual Net Sales divided by such Net Sales amount specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>;
<u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that with respect to any period after 2016,
TAK-390 MR Profits means (i)&nbsp;the actual amount of Net Sales for all
TAK-390 MR Products during such period multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;the forecasted
profit margin for all TAK-390 MR Products for the year 2016 as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAP &#150;
Abbott-Puerto Rico Marketing and Distribution Agreement</u>&#148; means that certain
Marketing and Distribution Agreement, dated as of May 1, 1985, between TAP and
Abbott-Puerto Rico, as amended prior to the effectiveness of the Amendment to
Marketing and Distribution Agreement (Puerto Rico).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAP 2007
Audited Balance Sheet</u>&#148; means the audited consolidated balance sheet
contained in the TAP 2007 Audited Financial Statements.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAP 2007 Audited Financial Statements</u>&#148; means the audited
consolidated financial statements of TAP and the TAP Subsidiaries as of December&nbsp;31,
2007 and for the year then ended prepared in accordance with GAAP.</font></p>

outstanding Class&nbsp;A common stock, without par value, of TAP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

Subsidiaries, including Newco (immediately prior to the Contribution and
Assumption) as of the Closing Date.</font></p>

Subsidiaries as of the Closing Date as set forth on the TAP Closing Balance
Sheet.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAP Confidential Information</u>&#148; means all documents and other
confidential or proprietary information (including information relating to
trade secrets, processes, unpublished patent and trademark applications and
product development), all inventions (whether patentable or unpatentable and
whether or not reduced to practice), all improvements thereto, all patent
disclosures, industrial designs, research and development, know-how, formulas,
compositions, manufacturing and production processes and techniques, technical
data, software, databases, designs, drawings, specifications, customer and
supplier lists, pricing and cost information, and business and marketing plans
and proposals,<b>  </b>concerning the
Retained Business.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAP Contract</u>&#148; means any Contract: (a)&nbsp;to which TAP or any
of the TAP Subsidiaries is or may become bound or under which TAP or any of the
TAP Subsidiaries has, or may become subject to, any obligation or (b)&nbsp;under
which TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries has or may acquire any right or
interest.</font></p>

prepared by TAP relating to this Agreement and included among the Schedules
referred to herein.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAP Intellectual Property</u>&#148; shall mean any Intellectual Property
owned by or licensed to TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries or otherwise used or
held for use by TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries (including Newco).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAP Material Adverse Effect</u>&#148; means any Occurrence that,
individually or when taken together with any other Occurrence, is materially
adverse or is reasonably expected to be materially adverse to the business,
operations, results of operations, condition (financial or otherwise), Assets
or Liabilities of the Retained Business taken as a whole; <u>provided</u> that
the following shall be excluded from the definition of TAP Material Adverse
Effect and from the determination of whether a TAP Material Adverse Effect has
occurred: (i)&nbsp;any Occurrence generally applicable to the industries and
markets in which the Retained Business is involved; (ii)&nbsp;any Occurrence
generally applicable to the United States or global economic conditions; (iii)&nbsp;any
Occurrence arising in connection with earthquakes, hostilities, acts of war,
sabotage or terrorism or military actions or any escalation or material
worsening of any such hostilities, acts of war, sabotage or terrorism or
military actions existing or underway as of the date hereof or (iv)&nbsp;any
Occurrence directly caused by the execution of the Transaction Documents or the
public announcement of the Contemplated Transactions, except to the extent, in
the case of clause (i), (ii)&nbsp;or (iii)&nbsp;above, that such Occurrence
results in a disproportionate impact on the Retained Business.<b>&#160; </b>For
purposes of <b>Sections 11.02(e)&nbsp;</b>and
<b>11.03(f)</b>, &#147;TAP Material Adverse
Effect&#148; shall include any Occurrence that would have a material adverse effect
on the likelihood that the Contemplated Transactions will qualify as a
reorganization under Sections 368(a)(1)(D)&nbsp;and 355 of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAP Material Contract</u>&#148; means any of the following by which TAP
or any of the TAP Subsidiaries are bound:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; each Contract, in each case as of the
date of this Agreement, the performance of which is expected to involve payment
or receipt of aggregate consideration in excess of $1,000,000 in the 12-month
period immediately following the date hereof;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; each Contract relating to the employment
of any employee with a salary in excess of $100,000, and any &#147;stay pay,&#148; termination,
change of control or other Contract pursuant to which TAP or any of the TAP
Subsidiaries is or may become obligated to make any severance, termination,
bonus or relocation payment or any other payment (other than payments in
respect of salary);</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; each Contract with Abbott or any of its
Affiliates;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; each Contract with Takeda or any of its
Affiliates;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; each material Contract granting to TAP
or any of the TAP Subsidiaries or by which TAP or any of the TAP Subsidiaries
obtains rights to use or register TAP Intellectual Property or that restricts
TAP&#146;s or any of the TAP Subsidiaries&#146; rights, or permits other Persons, to use
or register any Intellectual Property;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-23</font></p>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; each other Contract, if a breach or
termination of such Contract would reasonably be expected to result in a TAP
Material Adverse Effect or a Split-off Business Material Adverse Effect; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; each lease of any Leased Facility.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAP Sales Subsidiary</u>&#148; means TAP Pharmaceuticals Inc., a
Delaware corporation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>TAP Subsidiary</u>&#148; means any Subsidiary of TAP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Tax</u>&#148; or &#147;<u>Taxes</u>&#148; means any federal, state, local or
foreign income, gross receipts, franchise, estimated, alternative minimum,
add-on minimum, sales, use, transfer, registration, value added, excise,
natural resources, severance, stamp, occupation, premium, windfall profit,
environmental, customs, duties, real property, personal property, capital
stock, social security, unemployment, disability, payroll, license, employee or
other withholding, or other tax, of any kind whatsoever, including any
interest, penalties or additions to tax or additional amounts in respect to the
foregoing; the foregoing shall include any transferee or secondary liability
for a tax and any liability assumed by agreement or arising as a result of
being (or ceasing to be) a member of any Affiliated Group (or being included or
required to be included in any Tax Return relating thereto).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Tax Returns</u>&#148; means, with respect to any Tax, any information
return for such Tax, and any return, statement, declaration, claim for refund
or document filed or required to be filed under Applicable Law for such Tax.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Territory</u>&#148; means with respect to Prevacid Products, TAK-390 MR
Products, Uloric Products and Ilaprazole Products (x)&nbsp;Canada and (y)&nbsp;the
United States of America and its territories and possessions, including Puerto
Rico.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Third Party Consents</u>&#148; means any approval, consent,
ratification, permission, waiver or authorization from any Person other than a
Governmental Authority.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Title Commitment Headquarters Value</u>&#148; means an amount equal to $45.0
million.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Tolling Agreement-Lupron</u>&#148; means the
Tolling Agreement, dated as of the Closing Date, by and between TAP and Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Tolling Agreement-Prevacid</u>&#148; means the
Third Amended and Restated Tolling Agreement, dated as of the Closing Date, by
and between TAP and Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Tolling Agreement-Uloric</u>&#148; means the
Amended and Restated Supply Agreement, dated as of the Closing Date, by and
between Abbott and TAP.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Transaction Documents</u>&#148; means this Agreement, the Transition
Services Agreement, the Tolling Agreement-Prevacid, the Tolling
Agreement-Lupron, the Tolling Agreement-Uloric, the Headquarters Lease, the
Amended and Restated Tax Agreement, the Amended and Restated Employee Matters
Agreement, the Amended and Restated Abbott </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

value-added or similar Taxes (including any registration and/or stamp Taxes,
levies and duties) that may be imposed by reason of the sale, assignment,
transfer and delivery of the Transferred Assets to Newco.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Transferred Assets</u>&#148; means the following in existence at the

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all machinery, equipment, furniture,

(and interests in any of the foregoing) used or held for use<b>  </b>primarily in connection with the Split-off

and employment records and documentation developed or used for accounting,
marketing, engineering, manufacturing, or any other purpose relating primarily
to the conduct of the Split-off Business at any time prior to the Closing; <u>provided</u>,
<u>however</u>, that TAH and TAP shall be provided access to (and copies of)
all of the foregoing subsequent to the Contribution Effective Time as
reasonably requested by TAH and TAP;</font></p>

Uloric.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Uloric Profits</u>&#148; means an amount equal to the &#147;After-Tax Income&#148;
specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for all of the Uloric Products for the
period from the Closing Date until the applicable Cap Reference Date,
determined on a pro rata basis for any partial year or other period (the &#147;<u>Assumed
Uloric Profit Amount</u>&#148;); <u>provided</u> that such amount shall be (x)&nbsp;increased
if actual Net Sales of all Uloric Products in the respective period are greater
than Net Sales as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for such period and (y)&nbsp;decreased
if actual Net Sales of all Uloric Products in the respective period are less
than Net Sales as specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u> for such period, in each
case based on the product of (i)&nbsp;the Assumed Uloric Profit Amount
multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;a percentage equal to such actual Net Sales divided by
such Net Sales amount specified on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>; </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">provided</font></u>, <u>however</u>, that with respect to
any period after 2016, Uloric Profits means (i)&nbsp;the actual amount of Net
Sales for all Uloric Products during such period multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;the
forecasted profit margin for all Uloric Products for the year 2016 as specified
on <u>Exhibit&nbsp;III</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>VEP Amount</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the VEP LLC
Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>VEP LLC Contribution Agreement</u>&#148; means
the Contribution Agreement, dated as of the Closing Date, by and among TAP, the
TAP Sales Subsidiary and VEP LLC.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>VEP LLC Operating Agreement</u>&#148; means
the Amended and Restated Operating Agreement of Takeda Pharmaceuticals LLC,
dated as of the Closing Date, by and among TAP, the TAP Sales Subsidiary and
all Persons who, on or after the date thereof, become additional Members (as
defined therein).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>VEP Payment</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the VEP LLC
Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>VEP Period</u>&#148; has the meaning given to such term in the VEP LLC
Operating Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>VEP Products</u>&#148; means the Prevacid Products, TAK-390 MR Products,
Ilaprazole Products and Uloric Products.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>WARN</u>&#148; means the Worker Adjustment Retraining and Notification
Act, 29 U.S.C. &#167; 2101 et seq., or any similar Law.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-28</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
